T02D2625:308b-11: sa btsud [*bcu dag?] ga la gnas pa dang //
T02D2625:308b-12: spang bar sems pa gzhan dag kyang //
T02D2625:308b-13: thams cad rab tu 'gugs par byed //
T02D2625:308b-14: ces bya ba ni 'di'i mthu ba stan pa ste /
T02D2625:308b-16: na ma: sa manta bu ddh'a n'am aa /
T02D2625:308b-17: sarba tra aa pra ti ha ta ta th'a ga
T02D2625:308b-18: ta aam ku sha bo dhi tsa ra ya pa
T02D2625:308b-19: ri p'u ri ka sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:308b-20: zhes pa ste lhag ma ni go sla'o //
T02D2625:308b-21: de yi gzugs brnyan bri ba'am //
T02D2625:308b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2625:308b-23: gal te ro med na gzugs brnyan la sogs pa gris la //
T02D2625:308b-24: de nyid yin par bsams la /
T02D2625:308b-25: tshul snga ma lngar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02D2625:308b-27: lha yi gzugs su ba stan nas kyang //
T02D2625:308b-29: ro'am gzugs sam ming bris ba de bsnyen pa'am /
T02D2625:308b-31: dbang bskur ba'i dus su lhar bskyed pa'o //
T02D2625:308b-32: mchod rten dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02D2625:308b-33: zhes bya ba ni ro'am gzugs sam ming bris pa
T02D2625:308b-34: ji lta bar mchod rten gyi dbus su gzhag ste
T02D2625:308b-35: 'di ni lha nyid du bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2625:308b-36: skye bo dmigs ba can dag ni 'di mchod par
T02D2625:308b-37: bya ba ma yin no snyam du sems pa bzlog
T02D2625:308b-38: pa dang / bsod nams khyad par du 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2625:308b-39: rang gi lha'am lha gzhan gyi //
T02D2625:308b-40: snying po snying gar bris nas ni //
T02D2625:308b-42: rang gi lha zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:308b-43: gal te shi ba de la lhag pa'i lha zhig yod la /
T02D2625:308b-44: de yang slob dpon la sogs pas shes par nus na'o //
T02D2625:308b-45: lha gzhan gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:308b-46: gal te shi ba de la lhag pa'i lha med na dang /
T02D2625:308b-47: yod du zin kyang slob dpon la sogs pas shes par mi nus na /
T02D2625:309a-1: bcom ldan 'das thams cad rig pa la sogs pa'i sngags kyi tshogs bri'o //
T02D2625:309a-2: yang na ro la tshim par bya ba'i spyin sreg byas la /
T02D2625:309a-3: rus pa rnams mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag ste
T02D2625:309a-4: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems can chen po'i
T02D2625:309a-6: lha 'dra bar ni sems bskyed de //
T02D2625:309a-7: zhes bya ba ni mchod rten nam /
T02D2625:309a-8: lha'i gzugs kyi nang na gnas pa'i ro la sogs
T02D2625:309a-9: pa de la tha mal pa'i rnam par mi lha'i
T02D2625:309a-10: // lha'i rnam pa dang 'dra bar bsams la /
T02D2625:309a-11: khyim gyi nang du gzhag par bya //
T02D2625:309a-13: 'di rtag tu phyag byas pa la sogs pas bsod nams bsags pa'i gnas su bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2625:309a-14: khyim mam kun dga'i ra ba la sogs pa mi
T02D2625:309a-15: mang po 'du pa'i gnas su mchod rten la sogs
T02D2625:309a-17: de ltar yang 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las /
T02D2625:309a-18: spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rigs kyi bu'am /
T02D2625:309a-19: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can gang la la zhig gis mi rnams gnas pa'i phyogs su //
T02D2625:309a-20: mchod rten ni skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam /
T02D2625:309a-21: srog shing ni kha ba tsam /
T02D2625:309a-22: gdugs ni ba ku la'i me tog tsam zhig byas la /
T02D2625:309a-23: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings kyi
T02D2625:309a-24: tshigs su bcad pa nang du bcug na tshangs pa'i
T02D2625:309a-26: 'di nas shi 'phos shing shi ba'i dus byas nas /
T02D2625:309a-27: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2625:309a-28: de nas shi 'phos te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas /
T02D2625:309a-29: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T02D2625:309a-30: de bzhin du rgyud phyi ma las /
T02D2625:309a-34: gnyen du gyur pa la dbang bskur bar gsungs pa rnams /
T02D2625:309a-36: de yi ming nas smos nas kyang //
T02D2625:309a-37: zhes bya ba ni mchod rten gyis phan par bya ba ston te /
T02D2625:309a-38: gro ga'am shog shog la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags /
T02D2625:309a-39: ye dharm'a he tu pra bha w'a he tunte sh'anta th'a ga to hya ba data /
T02D2625:309a-40: te sh'anytsa yo ni ro dha ae wam b'a 'di ma h'a shra man: zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2625:309a-42: aom na mo bha ga wa te /
T02D2625:309b-0: sarba durga @309b ti pa ri sho dha ni r'a dz'a ya /
T02D2625:309b-6: sarba p'a pam bi sho dha ne /
T02D2625:309b-8: sarba karma a'a wa ra na bi sho dha ne
T02D2625:309b-9: che ge mo'i sarba karma a'a wa ra na bi
T02D2625:309b-12: mchod rten re re'i nang du bcug ste /
T02D2625:309b-13: srog shing dang gdugs dang bcas pa'i mchod rten slob dpon gyi khru gang yan chad pa'am /
T02D2625:309b-14: ji ltar nus pa'i tshad can bye ba'i bar du bya'o //
T02D2625:309b-15: de nas mjug tu rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga sngon bzhin du byas te /
T02D2625:309b-16: 'di lta bu'i mchod rten gyi las 'di ni bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan te ;
T02D2625:309b-17: de yang 'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mdo las /
T02D2625:309b-18: ji skad du gsungs pa ni ba stan zin la /
T02D2625:309b-19: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las kyang /
T02D2625:309b-20: gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs rnams su ni //
T02D2625:309b-21: 'jim pa'am ni bye ma las byas pa'i //
T02D2625:309b-22: bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can //
T02D2625:309b-23: sdig pa spyang phyir rtag tu gdab par bya //
T02D2625:309b-26: ji ltar spyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis //
T02D2625:309b-27: gsang sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob na //
T02D2625:309b-28: 'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa'am //
T02D2625:309b-29: yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag la gdab //
T02D2625:309b-30: de ni de yi sdig pa srid gzhan la //
T02D2625:309b-31: byas pa gang yin de ni zad 'gyur la //
T02D2625:309b-32: de ni gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid du //
T02D2625:309b-33: mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bras bu 'thob //
T02D2625:309b-35: tshig gi don rnams ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T02D2625:309b-36: de yi ming nas brjod nas ni //
T02D2625:309b-37: ji skad gsungs pa'i sngags bzlas shing //
T02D2625:309b-38: 'bum phrag stong ngam yang na ni //
T02D2625:309b-39: brgya phrag stong du tshang bar ni //
T02D2625:309b-40: bye ba snyed du rab bzlas na //
T02D2625:309b-41: lha yi gnas su nges par skye //
T02D2625:309b-42: zhes bya bas ni bzlas pa'i phan gdags pa ba stan te /
T02D2625:309b-43: bzlas pa'i grangs mi 'dra ba gsum ba stan pa ni /
T02D2625:309b-44: shi ba de'i sdig pa che ba dang /
T02D2625:309b-46: chung ba'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T02D2625:309b-48: dkyil 'khor chen po'am bris sku'i spyan sngar /
T02D2625:309b-49: bdag gi rnal 'byor ji ltar ba stan pa las /
T02D2625:310a-1: pa ltar rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2625:310a-2: de nas mjug tu smon lam rgya chen po dang /
T02D2625:310a-4: dge 'dun mnyes par bya ba ste sngar gsungs pa ltar bya ste /
T02D2625:310a-5: des ni lha'i gnas su nges par skye ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'thob ste /
T02D2625:310a-6: gsangs sngags kyi mthu ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir /
T02D2625:310a-8: gsang sngags yon tan sna tshogs bsam mi khyab //
T02D2625:310a-10: de bzhin du 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las kyang /
T02D2625:310a-11: sog nags me mched pa'i me lce yis //
T02D2625:310a-12: ma bsgribs bzhin du cheng [?] tshing kun bsregs ltar //
T02D2625:310a-13: bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar //
T02D2625:310a-14: brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig pa bsreg //
T02D2625:310a-15: ji ltar gangs la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis //
T02D2625:310a-16: gdungs na gzi brjid mi bzod 'jug ba bzhin //
T02D2625:310a-17: tshul khrims nyi ma'i 'od zer bzlas brjod kyis //
T02D2625:310a-18: gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang 'ju bar 'gyur //
T02D2625:310a-19: mun nag smag la mar me byung ba yis //
T02D2625:310a-20: mun nag ma lus sel bar byed pa ltar //
T02D2625:310a-21: tshe rabs stong na gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mun //
T02D2625:310a-22: bzlas brjod mar mes rab tu sel bar byed //
T02D2625:310a-24: de bas na gsang sngags kyi mthu'i bye brag bsam gyis mi khyab la /
T02D2625:310a-25: yid ches par bya ba med pa rnams la ni //
T02D2625:310a-26: bde ba gang yang med do zhes gzhan las gsungs pas //
T02D2625:310a-27: yid gnyis dang bral bas rtag tu gsang sngags kyi rnal 'byor la brtson par byas te /
T02D2625:310a-28: bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su rdzogs bar bya'o //
T02D2625:310a-29: de ltar dbang bskur ba dang /
T02D2625:310a-31: bzlas pas phan gdags pa rnams ni /
T02D2625:310a-32: rab tu gsal bar ba stan zin na /
T02D2625:310a-33: spyin sreg gis phan gdags pa ni ji lta bu
T02D2625:310a-34: zhig / spyin sreg ni 'dir rnam pa du zhig
T02D2625:310a-35: ces phyogs snga ma rnam par rtog pa rnams la
T02D2625:310a-36: / de yi ming nas brjod nas kyang //
T02D2625:310a-38: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2625:310a-40: sngon bzhin du ji ltar rigs pa'i cho gas sa'i tshul gtan la phab ste /
T02D2625:310b-0: dkyil 'khor lha'i sta gon du gnas pa yang @310b sngon bzhin du byas la //
T02D2625:310b-1: nang dang phyi'i thig kyang sngon bzhin btab pa las /
T02D2625:310b-2: snying po'i tshad las sor brgyang phyi rol pa'i nang du thab khung bya ba ni /
T02D2625:310b-3: khru bzhi pa yi tshad du ni //
T02D2625:310b-4: cho ga bzhin du khung brkos la //
T02D2625:310b-6: rgyar gru bzhi pa zabs su khru do pa'am /
T02D2625:310b-7: khor yug tu khru bzhi pa zabs su khru gang pa'i thab khung bya'o //
T02D2625:310b-8: rdo rjes tha ma bskor ba yi //
T02D2625:310b-10: mu rang gyi phyi rol phyi ma la rdo rje
T02D2625:310b-11: rtse lnga pas bskor ba la nang ma ma la
T02D2625:310b-13: 'khor lo dbus su bri bar bya //
T02D2625:310b-15: thab kyi nang na lhung bzed kyi zhabs lta bur byas pa der ;
T02D2625:310b-16: sna tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyang pa'i lte bar zla
T02D2625:310b-17: ba'i steng du 'khor lo rtsibs brgyang bri sa la
T02D2625:310b-18: / sdig pa 'joms pa'i spyin sreg byed na /
T02D2625:310b-19: rdo rje dang ldan par yang bya ba ste //
T02D2625:310b-21: rang gi sngags kyis btab pa'i shing //
T02D2625:310b-22: khung bu'i nang du gzhug par bya //
T02D2625:310b-23: zhes bya ba ni thab kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams nas
T02D2625:310b-24: phyogs bzhir ka ba bzhi mu rang phyi rol ma
T02D2625:310b-25: las khru gang gis mtho bar btsugs la /
T02D2625:310b-26: de'i steng du shing rlob pa bzhis re'u char byas la /
T02D2625:310b-27: de'i dbus su yang shing rlon pas bla gab byas te /
T02D2625:310b-28: de'i steng du 'jim pa bzang pos stug por bdal la /
T02D2625:310b-29: dbus su 'dzag pa'i bu ga dbus nas mtho gang khor yug tu bzhag la /
T02D2625:310b-30: de'i 'og tu kham pa'i snod bzed par 'dzag pa rnams slar bsreg go //
T02D2625:310b-31: de'i steng du shing rnams legs par brtsig ste /
T02D2625:310b-33: ha cang phra ba dang sbom pa dang /
T02D2625:310b-34: mtho ba dang dma' ba dag ma yin pa /
T02D2625:310b-36: shing de dag kyang skya bo med pa dri zhim pha ma rul ba /
T02D2625:310b-37: rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bsngags pa'i spos chus bsangs pa'o //
T02D2625:310b-38: de nas thab khung gi ngos dang ka ba dang /
T02D2625:310b-39: shing rnams kha dog dkar por byug go //
T02D2625:310b-40: rigs lnga yi ni phyag rgya rnams //
T02D2625:310b-41: ji bzhin pa yi phyogs su bri ;
T02D2625:310b-43: snying po mu ran dang bcas pa thab tu byas pa ma gtogs pa /
T02D2625:310b-44: lhag pa thams cad slob ma dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad pa bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
T02D2625:310b-45: cho ga shes pas bris nas kyang //
T02D2625:310b-47: rdul tshon bkye ba khrus byas te'o //
T02D2625:311a-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yo byad dgod pa'o //
T02D2625:311a-3: de la bya ba rnams ni rang rang gi mtshan ma dang po dang po'i rtsar gzhag cing /
T02D2625:311a-4: rnam par rgyal ba'i bya ba ni /
T02D2625:311a-5: lho'i sgo 'gram gang yang rung bar ro //
T02D2625:311a-6: las kyi bum pa ni shar sgo'i g-yas 'gram du ste /
T02D2625:311a-7: 'di ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'i dus su yang po //
T02D2625:311a-8: bkang ba'i bum pa ni phyi rol nas sbreng ngo //
T02D2625:311a-10: ro la sngags kyis btab nas kyang //
T02D2625:311a-11: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ste /
T02D2625:311a-12: sngags ni 'dir rtsa ba'i sngags nyid do //
T02D2625:311a-13: gtsug phud dpung par de bzhin te //
T02D2625:311a-14: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D2625:311a-32: gnas bcu bdun po de dag tu ni /
T02D2625:311a-33: dang po sarba bid bcu bris la /
T02D2625:311a-34: de'i rjes su rigs lnga'i sngags bri zhing /
T02D2625:311a-35: de'i rjes su rtsa ba'i sngags bris pa'i shog bu bcu bdun gdags so //
T02D2625:311a-36: de ltar gzhan du yi ge sngags mchog tu dge ba rnams gzhag go zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:311a-37: lte bar shog bu cig la /
T02D2625:311a-38: aom bhri ta zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum dang /
T02D2625:311a-39: aom ha na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsum
T02D2625:311a-40: yi ge go bzlog pa sprad pa bris la gdags
T02D2625:311a-46: long bu g-yon pa rnams su /
T02D2625:311a-47: aom kam ka ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags bris pa'i shog bu gdags so //
T02D2625:311a-48: de nas shog bu gcig la /
T02D2625:311a-50: tshe dpag tu med pa dang /
T02D2625:311a-51: dang po'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i sngags ma lus pa bris la mgul du btags te /
T02D2625:311a-52: de dag ni dkyil 'khor 'di'i yan lag yin pas so //
T02D2625:311a-53: de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas ro'i rnam par shes pa bkug la bstims te /
T02D2625:311a-54: de nas slob dpon la gsol ba gdab pa dang /
T02D2625:311a-55: me tog dor ba spyin pa dang /
T02D2625:311b-0: @311b dbang ma lus pa bskur ba ste /
T02D2625:311b-1: 'dir me tog kyang slob dpon la dor la /
T02D2625:311b-2: sngar sta gon la gnas pa'i dus su byin gyis brlabs ba'i bum pas dbang bskur te /
T02D2625:311b-3: de na ro spyang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di ni mchod
T02D2625:311b-4: pa gtso bor gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor yin gyi dbang
T02D2625:311b-5: bskur ba gtso bor gyur pa ma yin no ;
T02D2625:311b-6: / de nas ngan song sbyong pa'i phyir //
T02D2625:311b-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2625:311b-8: ga pur gur gum la sogs pas //
T02D2625:311b-9: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bsreg bya dgod pa ste /
T02D2625:311b-10: 'dir til ni las grub pa'i rdzas te gtsor bya'o //
T02D2625:311b-11: yungs kar ni thugs dam bskul ba'i rdzas so //
T02D2625:311b-12: lhag ma rnams ni tshim par bya ba'i rdzas so //
T02D2625:311b-13: tshig gi don ni go sla'o //
T02D2625:311b-14: de nas byin zas dge ba rab spar la //
T02D2625:311b-15: zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi yog pa'am /
T02D2625:311b-16: shing dkar po gtsubs pa las byung ba'i me rlung yab kyis sbar ba /
T02D2625:311b-17: aom badzra dzva la h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02D2625:311b-18: rtsva skam po'i phye ma dang lci skam gyi phye
T02D2625:311b-19: mas cher spar la yam shing til mar gyis byugs
T02D2625:311b-21: bud shing brtsigs pa'i dbus su gzhag go //
T02D2625:311b-22: lha yi sbyor ba rab gnas la //
T02D2625:311b-24: me sbar ma thag tu lhag pa'i lha'i lus su gnas par bya'o //
T02D2625:311b-25: blo mchog ldan pa'i mdun du gzugs sogs gzhag / ces bya ba ni /
T02D2625:311b-26: dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams bris pa'am /
T02D2625:311b-27: lugs ma la sogs pa ste /
T02D2625:311b-29: ting nge 'dzin gsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2625:311b-30: me lce stong gis dkrigs shing 'bar ba'i lus //
T02D2625:311b-31: zla dkar kunda'i bzhin la zhi ba'i lus //
T02D2625:311b-32: mtha' yas gzugs kyis me bkug la //
T02D2625:311b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni me lha spyan drang pa dang mchod pa ste /
T02D2625:311b-34: de la mtha' yas pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:311b-35: re zhig rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa las /
T02D2625:311b-36: me lha 'di snyed cig gsungs te /
T02D2625:311b-37: lag na rdo rje gzhan yang dus gcig gi tshe na yang /
T02D2625:311b-38: nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te /
T02D2625:311b-39: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dug pa dang /
T02D2625:311b-41: kye tshangs pa chen po me lha rnam pa du yod par shes par bya zhes dris pa dang /
T02D2625:312a-2: me nga rgyal can gang yin pa de ni rang byung ba'o //
T02D2625:312a-3: de'i 'og tu tshangs pa'i bu ste /
T02D2625:312a-4: de la sras skyes pa yin no //
T02D2625:312a-5: 'jig rten pa'i me pa ba ka / tshangs pa'i bu ni dang po yin //
T02D2625:312a-6: de'i bu tshangs pa'i zas de'i yang //
T02D2625:312a-7: ba ra dva zhes bya bar bshad //
T02D2625:312a-8: de'i bu bi shva na ra dang //
T02D2625:312a-9: ha ban dang bsreg bya len //
T02D2625:312a-10: ngos srungs aa thar ba ni yi //
T02D2625:312a-11: bu yin par ni rgya mtshor grags //
T02D2625:312a-12: rlung zhes bya ba'i me de ni //
T02D2625:312a-13: mngal du 'jug pa'i cho gar bshad //
T02D2625:312a-14: de nas me khrus bya ba la //
T02D2625:312a-15: de bzhin ba ba ma nar shes //
T02D2625:312a-16: bkra shis zhes bya mtshams kyi mtshams //
T02D2625:312a-17: bcas pa'i las la phra gal bha'o //
T02D2625:312a-19: de bzhin dkan dbab pa la gtsang //
T02D2625:312a-20: shad pa'i zhes bya gtsug phud la //
T02D2625:312a-21: brtul zhugs spyin la kun 'byung ngo //
T02D2625:312a-22: nyi ma zhes bya phyug byi ba la //
T02D2625:312a-23: bag ma len pa sbyor byed bshad //
T02D2625:312a-24: aa ni yas ni 'khyil ka bsri //
T02D2625:312a-25: nye bar 'bral la me nyid do //
T02D2625:312a-26: ba ba ka zhes bya ba'i me //
T02D2625:312a-27: sna tshogs lha la spyar bar bshad //
T02D2625:312a-28: khyim bdag la ni tshangs pa'i me //
T02D2625:312a-29: de bzhin yon dbul ba la shing //
T02D2625:312a-30: de bzhin phyugs ni bcing ba la //
T02D2625:312a-31: aa ba ni ka zhes pa'i me //
T02D2625:312a-32: lhung bal ni bi bi rtsi //
T02D2625:312a-33: btsas byin la ni sa ha sa //
T02D2625:312a-34: dus kyi mtshams la ha bir shes //
T02D2625:312a-35: de bzhin zla ba gnas la gter //
T02D2625:312a-36: mri da zhes bya dgang blugs la //
T02D2625:312a-37: zhi la da ru nar 'dod do //
T02D2625:312a-38: byas mtha' me ni gshin rje'o //
T02D2625:312a-39: de bzhin rgyal po stobs spyin pa'o //
T02D2625:312a-40: drag shul spyad pa thams cad la //
T02D2625:312a-41: khro bo'i me ni rab tu bsgrags //
T02D2625:312a-42: 'dod las skyed ces bya ba'i me //
T02D2625:312a-43: de ni dbang po'i don du bshad //
T02D2625:312a-44: nags tshal ba sregs la pho nya'i me //
T02D2625:312a-45: khong pa'i me ni dza ta ra //
T02D2625:312a-46: bzang bar bya ba sha thar bshad //
T02D2625:312a-47: rgod pa'i kha ni rgya mtsho na'o //
T02D2625:312a-48: zad tshe 'jigs pa zhes bya ste //
T02D2625:312a-49: dus mtha'i me ni yang dag bsgrags //
T02D2625:312a-51: nges pa khyod la bshad pa ste //
T02D2625:312a-52: rig byed thos pa spyod rnams kyis //
T02D2625:312a-53: tshangs pa'i bu dag brjod pa yin //
T02D2625:312a-54: bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi 'di dag ni //
T02D2625:312a-55: de yi tshe na ngas ba stan to //
T02D2625:312b-0: gsang @312b pa'i bdag po de la ni //
T02D2625:312b-1: me rnams mtshan nyid mi shes par //
T02D2625:312b-2: gang dag spyin sreg byed pa ni //
T02D2625:312b-3: spyin sreg ma yin legs byas min //
T02D2625:312b-5: ngas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T02D2625:312b-6: me bcu gnyis ba stan te /
T02D2625:312b-7: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02D2625:312b-8: ye shes me ni dang po ste //
T02D2625:312b-9: de ni dbang chen zhes su bsgrags //
T02D2625:312b-10: kha dog ser po'i mdog can la //
T02D2625:312b-11: mdog dang rgyas dang stobs rab ster //
T02D2625:312b-13: ye shes rdzogs byed yin zhes bya //
T02D2625:312b-14: gnyis pa 'dzin byed ces bya ste //
T02D2625:312b-16: dpal ldan gos ni dmar po gos //
T02D2625:312b-17: bgrad phreng ril ba spyi blugs thogs //
T02D2625:312b-18: gsum pa rlung zhes bya ba ste //
T02D2625:312b-19: mdog ni gang la rtsub pa'o //
T02D2625:312b-20: bzhi pa dmar po zhes bya ste //
T02D2625:312b-21: nub ka'i mtshams kyi dmar thag 'dra //
T02D2625:312b-22: lnga pa mi ta zhes bya ba //
T02D2625:312b-23: spun la kha dog kham pa ste //
T02D2625:312b-24: mgrin pa ring zhing gzi brjid che //
T02D2625:312b-25: kun la phan ni 'dogs par byed //
T02D2625:312b-26: drug pa khro bo zhes bya ste //
T02D2625:312b-27: mig yon dud pa'i kha dog 'dra //
T02D2625:312b-28: gyen du skra brdzes sgra cher 'byin //
T02D2625:312b-29: mche ba bzhi po stobs po che //
T02D2625:312b-30: bdun pa lto ba zhes bya ste //
T02D2625:312b-31: rnal 'byor kha dog kun dang ldan //
T02D2625:312b-32: brgyang pa zad pa zhes bya ba //
T02D2625:312b-34: dgu pa yid las skyes zhes bya //
T02D2625:312b-35: sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che //
T02D2625:312b-37: sha za me ni de las gzhan //
T02D2625:312b-38: rmugs byed ces bya bcu gnyis te //
T02D2625:312b-39: sems can thams cad rmugs byed pa'o //
T02D2625:312b-40: gsang ba'i bdag po las ni de ltar /
T02D2625:312b-41: mi yi gzugs ni byin rlabs te //
T02D2625:312b-42: bdag gi sa yi gzugs dang ni //
T02D2625:312b-43: rdzas kyang de yi ngo bor bya //
T02D2625:312b-44: 'di ni phyi yi spyin sreg ste //
T02D2625:312b-45: dngos grub 'dod pas spyin sreg bya //
T02D2625:312b-47: de dag re re yang sna tshogs par snang bskyed nus pas na //
T02D2625:312b-48: mtha' yas pa yi gzugs kyi ma //
T02D2625:312b-50: 'dir ni ye shes kyi me'am mri ta'i me de bkug la /
T02D2625:312b-51: mchod pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2625:312b-52: til dang yungs kar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2625:312b-53: me la sreg rdzas ci rigs dbul ba dang /
T02D2625:313a-2: me lha la mchod pa sreg rdzas cung zad cig phul nas /
T02D2625:313a-3: lha rnams spyan drang zhing mchod pa dang /
T02D2625:313a-4: sreg rdzas gsol bar bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2625:313a-5: lha rnams mang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2625:313a-6: lha rnams mang po spyan drangs la //
T02D2625:313a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bshad pa ni /
T02D2625:313a-8: ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2625:313a-10: phyi dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byas nas /
T02D2625:313a-11: spyin sreg bya ba'i ched ni ji tsam zhe na /
T02D2625:313a-12: ji srid mchen [*mtshan?] ma shin tu ni //
T02D2625:313a-15: shin tu 'bar ba'i gnas ni me'i dbus so //
T02D2625:313a-17: de nas 'di ni nges par yang //
T02D2625:313a-19: skyes pa yin par shes par bya //
T02D2625:313a-20: zhes bya ba'i bar du ga sungs so //
T02D2625:313a-21: me'i mchen [*mtshan?] ma de dag ni mdor ba stan pa ste /
T02D2625:313a-22: rgyas pa ni 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las /
T02D2625:313a-23: me yi mtshan ma nye bar brtag pa ni //
T02D2625:313a-24: me stag dub me lce sgra rnams las //
T02D2625:313a-25: grub pa dang ni ma grub thams cad kyang //
T02D2625:313a-26: sngags kyis byin rlabs me ni ston par byed //
T02D2625:313a-27: du ba med cing gser gyi mdog ltar dangs //
T02D2625:313a-28: rab tu che la me lce g-yas su 'khyil //
T02D2625:313a-29: kha dog 'ja' 'dra yang na dkar yang rung ;
T02D2625:313a-30: / yang na byi ru bcag pa'i kha dog 'dra //
T02D2625:313a-31: shin tu zlum pa me lce bkab nas 'phro //
T02D2625:313a-32: rab tu 'bar ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra //
T02D2625:313a-33: dbyibs ni bum pa rgyal mtshan gdugs kyang 'dra //
T02D2625:313a-34: dpal be'u dung dang padma blugs gzar 'dra //
T02D2625:313a-35: yang na shing rta mchog dang rnga yab 'dra //
T02D2625:313a-36: me ri dang 'dra rdza rnga gling bu'i sgra //
T02D2625:313a-37: du ba me lce dri zhim me stag bzang //
T02D2625:313a-38: yang na me spar bar yang 'bar 'gyur na //
T02D2625:313a-39: de tshe dngos grub rgya chen thob par 'gyur //
T02D2625:313a-40: du ba mang zhing me stag rgod pa dang //
T02D2625:313a-41: 'bar bar dka' zhing cung zad cung zad 'bar //
T02D2625:313a-42: me lce rnam par chad cing gzi mdangs med //
T02D2625:313a-43: rtsub nag sprin dang p'a la sha'i mdog / gsal shing 'dra zhing zhib ma'i gzugs kyang 'dra //
T02D2625:313a-44: phyugs kyi mgo 'dra sgra yang rab tu rtsub //
T02D2625:313a-45: me lce 'phro bas spyin sreg byed pa tshig / mi ro'i dri nga dngos grub med par ston //
T02D2625:313a-46: me yi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong nas ni //
T02D2625:313a-47: stobs po che yi mar gyi spyin sreg bya //
T02D2625:313b-1: / spyin sreg dbul ba'i rim pa ba stan pa'i phyir //
T02D2625:313b-2: de nas byin za la ni brtag bya ba //
T02D2625:313b-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2625:313b-4: dang por me'i lha la ci bsreg pa'i rdzas rnams las ci rigs cig go //
T02D2625:313b-5: de nas dbus kyi gtso bo nas bzung ste /
T02D2625:313b-6: rdo rje dril bu'i bar la'o //
T02D2625:313b-7: de nas lhag pa'i lha la'o //
T02D2625:313b-8: de nas byams pa la sogs pa la'o //
T02D2625:313b-9: de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa shin tu phyi rol gyi lha rnams la'o //
T02D2625:313b-10: de nas yang mchod pa dang bstod pa byas la /
T02D2625:313b-11: lha rnams gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
T02D2625:313b-12: de nas me'i lha la mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02D2625:313b-13: bsreg bya lhag ma phul la bzod par gsol ba dang /
T02D2625:313b-14: gsol ba gdab par byas la /
T02D2625:313b-15: de yang gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2625:313b-16: 'di ni tshim par bya ba'i spyin sreg go //
T02D2625:313b-17: de lta bu'i spyin sreg gis ni /
T02D2625:313b-18: srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa'i mya
T02D2625:313b-19: ngan las 'das pa brnyes pa thams cad tshim par
T02D2625:313b-21: ji skad du dpal mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje dra ba las gsungs pa /
T02D2625:313b-22: 'di yis rdo rje can mnyes shing //
T02D2625:313b-23: ye shes me yang rab mnyes so //
T02D2625:313b-24: rgyal ba rtag pa mnyes pa dang //
T02D2625:313b-27: rta mchog bdag po mnyes par 'gyur ;
T02D2625:313b-28: / tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che //
T02D2625:313b-29: khyab 'jug rlung dang chu chen dang //
T02D2625:313b-31: zla ba nyi ma gza' gzhan dang //
T02D2625:313b-32: sa dang zhags pa 'dzin pa dang //
T02D2625:313b-33: lus ngan dang ni ro zan dang //
T02D2625:313b-34: chos rgyal dang ni klu nyid dang //
T02D2625:313b-35: dri za lha min mi min dang //
T02D2625:313b-36: sum cu rtsa gsum gnas lha dang //
T02D2625:313b-37: 'og min na ni gnas rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-38: rgyal chen ris na gnas rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-39: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-40: 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-41: gtsang ma'i gnas na gnas rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-43: khams na gnas pa rnams nyid de ;
T02D2625:313b-44: / khams can po na gnas nyid dang //
T02D2625:313b-45: sems can gling bzhir gnas rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-46: khams gsum na ni gnas rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-47: snod dang sems can 'jig rten dang //
T02D2625:313b-48: lcug ma sdong po sbur ma sogs //
T02D2625:313b-49: sa ga ba la gnas rnams dang //
T02D2625:313b-50: dri med pha rol son pa dang //
T02D2625:314a-2: mi g-yo ba la gnas byas dang //
T02D2625:314a-3: chos kyi sprin du rjes zhugs dang //
T02D2625:314a-4: spyang dka' bar ni song ba dang //
T02D2625:314a-5: ring du song ba thob pa rnams //
T02D2625:314a-6: 'od byed pa la nges gnas dang //
T02D2625:314a-7: mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug dang //
T02D2625:314a-8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi //
T02D2625:314a-9: 'phags pa'i gang zag chen po brgyang //
T02D2625:314a-10: bse ru lta bu rnams dang ni //
T02D2625:314a-11: dmyal ba yi dvags byol song dang //
T02D2625:314a-12: lha dang lha min mi min rnams //
T02D2625:314a-13: spyin sreg cho gas mgu 'gyur te //
T02D2625:314a-15: de bas na ji ltar bris pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po srid pa dang zhi ba'i ngo bo de /
T02D2625:314a-16: slob dpon gyis me lha'i snying gar bkod de spyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2625:314a-17: de ltar lha rnams tshim par byas nas /
T02D2625:314a-18: de nas sdig pa gzhom pa'i spyin sreg bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2625:314a-19: de nas spyan drangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D2625:314a-20: snga ma'i me lha ni ye shes kyi me lha yin la /
T02D2625:314a-21: 'dir ni rlung gi me yin pas //
T02D2625:314a-22: mngon spyod kyi bsreg bya rnams bsdus te /
T02D2625:314a-23: me'i dbus su rlung gi me spyan drangs te /
T02D2625:314a-24: sngar bshad pa'i drag po'i yon chab phul la /
T02D2625:314a-25: drag po'i bsreg bya rgyud 'di nyid kyi mngon spyod kyi spyin sreg las gsungs pa rnams la /
T02D2625:314a-26: ci rigs re re bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2625:314a-27: 'dir padma dkar zhal zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:314a-28: rlung gi me nyid la ma rungs pa grub par
T02D2625:314a-29: 'dod pa dag gi yid du 'ong bas na padma
T02D2625:314a-32: phyag na rdo rje padma zhags pa bsnams //
T02D2625:314a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams smos te /
T02D2625:314a-34: me lha'i snying gar spyan drangs pa la snga ma ltar mchod pa dang spyin sreg bya ste /
T02D2625:314a-35: 'dir sdig mnan cing zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:314a-36: shi ba'i ro sdig pa'i gzugs can bsreg par bya ba ste /
T02D2625:314a-37: zhabs kyis mnan te sreg par mdzad la /
T02D2625:314a-38: de bsreg pa nyid kyis shi ba'i sdig pa bsregs pa'o //
T02D2625:314a-39: 'dir man ngag ni til nag po btags pa las /
T02D2625:314a-40: sha za lta bu'i sdig pa byas la de gtub cing spyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2625:314a-41: de'i snying pos zhes bya ba ni khro bo me'i sngags bskul ba smos pa nyed kyis so //
T02D2625:314a-42: ci ste mtshan ma la sogs 'byung //
T02D2625:314a-43: de bzhin sdig can rgyud ces bya //
T02D2625:314a-46: sdig pa zad par shes par byas la /
T02D2625:314b-0: @314b mtshan ma ngan pa byung na ni /
T02D2625:314b-1: sdig can du shes par bya'o //
T02D2625:314b-2: ci ste sdig can gcig yin na ni //
T02D2625:314b-3: de nas thal bar gyur pa dang zhes bya ba nas /
T02D2625:314b-4: las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur //
T02D2625:314b-5: zhes bya ba'i bar du spyar ro //
T02D2625:314b-6: sdig pa med par gyur na rus pa rnams sa
T02D2625:314b-7: stegs la sogs pa byas pa tsam gyis chog go
T02D2625:314b-8: // de ltar na bdag gis spyin sreg gi skabs
T02D2625:314b-9: 'dir go rims nges par gtsor byas te brjod pa
T02D2625:314b-10: // tsam mo // da ni spyin sreg gi cho ga nges pa cung zad brjod de /
T02D2625:314b-11: thab khung dang bud shing brjod pa dang /
T02D2625:314b-12: dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang /
T02D2625:314b-15: ro byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2625:314b-17: mig gi rten gzhag pa dang /
T02D2625:314b-21: me lha dgug cing rdzas dbul ba dang /
T02D2625:314b-22: lhag pa'i lha bskyed cing spyan drang ba dang /
T02D2625:314b-23: mchod cing sreg rdzas dbul ba dang /
T02D2625:314b-25: lha rnams gshegs par bskul ba dang /
T02D2625:314b-26: ji lta ba bzhin sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang /
T02D2625:314b-27: me lha gshegs su gsol ba dang /
T02D2625:314b-28: sdig pa 'joms pa'i spyin sreg bya ba rnams ni //
T02D2625:314b-29: 'dir cho ga'i rim pa mdor ba stan pa ste /
T02D2625:314b-30: de la thab khud rnams kyang mdor bsdus na gnyis te /
T02D2625:314b-33: de la 'phags pa dpung bzangs la sogs pa'i rjes
T02D2625:314b-34: su 'brangs te las thams cad pa'i thab khung nyid
T02D2625:314b-36: rgyud phal cher ni zhi ba'i thab khung nyid las thams cad pa'i thab khung du gsungs so //
T02D2625:314b-37: re zhig rgyud 'dir ni las thams cad pa'i thab khung zhes gsungs pa med kyi /
T02D2625:314b-38: las bzhi pa'i thab khung so sor gsungs so //
T02D2625:314b-39: de la ro yongs su spyang ba'i thab khung ni
T02D2625:314b-40: zhi ba'i thab khung gsum la sngar ba stan pa
T02D2625:314b-41: ltar chen po'i tshad du bya'o //
T02D2625:314b-42: de nas ba stan pa ltar bud shing brtsigs te /
T02D2625:314b-43: dkyil 'khor chen po sngon bzhin bris la /
T02D2625:314b-45: de nas g-yas su dgang blugs kyi mar khu dang /
T02D2625:315a-6: me tog dri zhim po dang /
T02D2625:315a-9: aa shva ttha la sogs pa'i yam shing dam pa
T02D2625:315a-10: zung re dang bcas pa dag thab khung las dpags
T02D2625:315a-11: te / sor nyi shu rtsa bzhi man chad sor bcu drug man chad dam /
T02D2625:315a-12: sor brgyang yan chad pa'i lcug ma ma gas shing mi 'khyog pa /
T02D2625:315a-14: rtse mo'i cha las byung ba /
T02D2625:315a-17: btung ba rab tu bkang ba /
T02D2625:315a-18: yungs kar dkar po rnams g-yas su gzhag ste /
T02D2625:315a-19: ji skad sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
T02D2625:315a-20: spyin sreg la dgos g-yas su gzhag / ces gsungs pas so //
T02D2625:315a-26: bzed rdo rje sor bzhi pa /
T02D2625:315a-27: de'i nyid las g-yon du chu'i snod gzhag go zhes gsungs so //
T02D2625:315a-28: chu'i snod ni yon chab yin pas /
T02D2625:315a-29: mchod pa'i tshogs gzhan gyis nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D2625:315a-30: dgang gzar khru re ba dngul lam mchod spyin gyi
T02D2625:315a-31: shing kha dog dkar po las byas pa yu ba'i
T02D2625:315a-32: rtse mo na rdo rje dang rin po che ser
T02D2625:315a-33: drug pa can rtse mo na rdo rje sor bzhi
T02D2625:315a-34: pa / de'i rtse mo na sor bzhi gru bzhi ba sor gnyis gting du brkos pa /
T02D2625:315a-35: dbus na rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje sor gcig
T02D2625:315a-36: pa'i srid la zheng dang rngams ci rigs su byas
T02D2625:315a-37: pas mtshon pa / gdong nyid na bcud 'bab pa'i lam mthe'u chung gi zabs kyi srid pa /
T02D2625:315a-38: mtheb tshigs nub pa'i kha wa can no //
T02D2625:315a-39: blugs gzar yu ba sngon bzhin las //
T02D2625:315a-40: rtse mo'i dkyus sor gnyis pa'i rgya la /
T02D2625:315a-41: sor gcig pa'i zabs yod pa padma'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs can /
T02D2625:315a-42: rtse mo lnga pa'i rdo rje rtse gcig gis dbus nas mtshan pa'o //
T02D2625:315a-43: de dag dang rdo rje dril bu dang /
T02D2625:315a-45: de nas sngon bzhin phyogs kyi rgyan dang /
T02D2625:315a-47: 'og tu yang me tog dang 'bru kha dog dkar pos gtor ma dag kyang byas la /
T02D2625:315a-48: stan bzang po dgod pas ci nas kyang yid nyams dga' ba de ltar byas te /
T02D2625:315a-49: de nas sngar bshad pa ltar ro byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D2625:315b-0: ras dkar po la padma 'dab ma brgyang pa dkar po gur kum gyis bris @315b la ;
T02D2625:315b-1: de bting ba'i lte bar ro legs par kha shar
T02D2625:315b-2: ram nub bam lhag pa'i lha'i gnas su bltas par
T02D2625:315b-3: gzhag / steng nas kyang ras dkar po la /
T02D2625:315b-4: padma dab ma brgyang ba bris pa'i 'dab ma la /
T02D2625:315b-5: dpal be'u la sogs pa'i bkra shis kyi mtshan ma bris pas g-yogs la gzhag go //
T02D2625:315b-6: de nas yang khrus byas la /
T02D2625:315b-7: rje btsun thams cad rig pa'i bris sku'am /
T02D2625:315b-8: lugs ma'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs dang bcas par /
T02D2625:315b-9: me dang du bas mi gnod par sgrub pa po'i mig gis ltar rung ba'i phyogs su gzhag go //
T02D2625:315b-10: de nas sngar bshad pa'i bsrung ba'i sbyor ba byas la /
T02D2625:315b-11: gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me //
T02D2625:315b-12: dge ba'i las la rab tu shis //
T02D2625:315b-14: yang na sngar smos pa lta bu'i snga ma ltar spyar te /
T02D2625:315b-16: me snod gzhan zhig spros te /
T02D2625:315b-17: sngar ba stan pa'i bya ba la spyar ro //
T02D2625:315b-18: de nas h'um bdun zlos shing /
T02D2625:315b-19: mar khu gzar bu chen po gang ba bdun blugs te /
T02D2625:315b-20: sngar gsungs pa'i mchen [*mtshan?] ma brtag pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D2625:315b-21: de la slob dpon yid rab tu bsdams pas rang
T02D2625:315b-22: gi dam tshig sems dpa'i rnal 'byor gsang ba'i mchod
T02D2625:315b-23: pa brjod pa'i bar du byas la /
T02D2625:315b-24: aom badzra sa tva h'um zhes zlos shing /
T02D2625:315b-25: ku sha ma nyams pas me'i steng ngam thab khung nyid g-yogs par bya ste /
T02D2625:315b-26: ji ltar ku sha'i tshogs tshig pa las /
T02D2625:315b-27: sdig pa'i tshogs tshig pa'o zhes bram zer rnams rtog pa'i lugs nyid dang mthun par byas pa'o //
T02D2625:315b-28: kha cig na re ro yongs su spyang ba'i spyin sreg la ni /
T02D2625:315b-29: ku sha dgram mi dgos so zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:315b-31: thab khung gi ni g-yas phyogs nas //
T02D2625:315b-32: ku sha'i rtsva ni rlon pa dgram //
T02D2625:315b-33: rtse mo dag kyang rtsa bas dkri //
T02D2625:315b-34: rtsa ba dag kyang rtse mos dkri //
T02D2625:315b-35: zhes bye brag med par gsungs pas /
T02D2625:315b-36: dgram pa 'dir yang bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:315b-37: de'i rjes la sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
T02D2625:315b-38: me yi phyogs nas bod pa ni //
T02D2625:315b-39: gsus po che la mig gsum pa //
T02D2625:315b-40: gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi dang ldan //
T02D2625:315b-41: 'od dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can //
T02D2625:316a-2: las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan //
T02D2625:316a-3: lag pa dang po mchog spyin la //
T02D2625:316a-4: gnyis pa la ni sngags nor phreng //
T02D2625:316a-5: g-yon pa ril ba spyi blugs te //
T02D2625:316a-6: gnyis pa na ni bo con nyid //
T02D2625:316a-7: mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la //
T02D2625:316a-8: drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba //
T02D2625:316a-9: 'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang //
T02D2625:316a-10: thab kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2625:316a-13: padma dkar po'i zhal 'dra dge / padma nor bu'i ril ba thogs //
T02D2625:316a-14: lag na ldan dkar mchog thogs pa //
T02D2625:316a-15: padma dkar po'i stan stengs 'dug / ces pa'i me lha'i lha thams cad kyi dbus su /
T02D2625:316a-16: yi ge ram dkar po las byung bar bsams pa la /
T02D2625:316a-17: zhi ba'i mchod yon snying gar bzung ste /
T02D2625:316a-18: de yang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2625:316a-19: g-yas pa mi 'jigs mthe bskyod cing //
T02D2625:316a-20: gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin //
T02D2625:316a-21: me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo //
T02D2625:316a-22: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs 'byung po che //
T02D2625:316a-23: lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog / sreg blugs zhal zas bzhes slad du //
T02D2625:316a-24: 'di nyid du ni bzhugs su gsol //
T02D2625:316a-25: aom aagan ye a'a di py'a di bya aa bi
T02D2625:316a-26: sha ma h'a shri ye ha bya ka bya ba
T02D2625:316a-29: de nas dza:h'um bam ho:zhes brjod pas ji ltar bskyed ba dang /
T02D2625:316a-30: gnyis su med par byas la /
T02D2625:316a-32: lag g-yon rdo rje bzang gtor te //
T02D2625:316a-33: mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga da bul //
T02D2625:316a-36: de la spyin sreg la dgos pa //
T02D2625:316a-37: kun la lan gsum sreg blugs dbul //
T02D2625:316a-40: zhes gsungs pa dang spyar te /
T02D2625:316a-41: de nas me 'bar ba'i rnam par gnas pa'am /
T02D2625:316a-42: de'i dbyibs ma bor ba'i de'i snying gar dkyil 'khor chen po bskyed la /
T02D2625:316a-43: mchod pa'i cho ga las ba stan pa ltar spyan drang zhing bstims te /
T02D2625:316a-44: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la /
T02D2625:316a-45: yon chab dang bsang gtor bya ste /
T02D2625:316a-46: mchod pa brgyang yan lag dang bcas pas mchod la /
T02D2625:316a-47: sreg rdzas rnams las cung zad cig ma lus par bsregs shing /
T02D2625:316a-48: de nas bstod pa brjod la /
T02D2625:316b-0: yang @316b yon chab la sogs pa phul te /
T02D2625:316b-1: aom kri to ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T02D2625:316b-2: gshegs su gsol la bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bdag nyid
T02D2625:316b-3: la bsdu'o // 'dis dbus kyi bdag po ni ro de nyid yin par 'dod do //
T02D2625:316b-4: de la mchod pa'i sngags rnams ni ba stan zin la /
T02D2625:316b-5: bsreg bya rnams kyi sngags ni /
T02D2625:316b-8: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-10: aom badzra pushta ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-12: aom badzra bi dza ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-14: aom ma h'a be g'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-16: aom badzra gha sma ri ye sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-18: aom ma h'a ba la ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-20: aom badzra a'a yu she sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-22: aom aa bra ti ha ta badzr'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-24: aom badzra ya dzny'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-26: aom bodhi briksh'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-28: aom badzra la da ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-30: aom badzra ku be r'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2625:316b-32: yungs kar la ni rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
T02D2625:316b-33: ngan 'gro gsum bcas pa'i sngags dang /
T02D2625:316b-34: til gyi sngags rnams bzlas te /
T02D2625:316b-35: mjug rnams su gsol ba gdab cing bsreg go //
T02D2625:316b-36: rdzas gang la rang gi sngags med pa der ni /
T02D2625:316b-37: til gyi sngags sam bdag po'i sngags kyis bsreg go //
T02D2625:316b-38: rdzas rnams kyi rim pa yang /
T02D2625:316b-39: sngar rdzas nyid ji ltar smos pa nas rim pas so //
T02D2625:316b-40: de la yon chab ni mdun du'o //
T02D2625:316b-44: zho la sogs pa ni zhal cung zad gdangs par te /
T02D2625:316b-45: drag shul spyad pa la ni /
T02D2625:316b-47: mar me dang bdug pa mdun du'o //
T02D2625:316b-49: yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D2625:316b-50: 'bras la sogs pa ni phyag tu dbul lo //
T02D2625:316b-51: de dag kyang dang po ni me'i lha la'o //
T02D2625:316b-52: de nas khro bo'i rdo rje la ste /
T02D2625:316b-53: gang gis me la sogs pa srung ba'i las byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i byang na gnas pa'o //
T02D2625:316b-54: de gnyis la ni gsum gsum mo //
T02D2625:316b-55: de nas dkon mchog gsum la'o //
T02D2625:316b-57: de nas rje btsun ngan song spyong ba la brgya rtsa brgyang do //
T02D2625:316b-58: de nas ni sngon bzhin no //
T02D2625:317a-0: sngags rnams ni sngar ba stan pa rnams @317a * //
T02D2625:317a-2: kha cig na re sngags rnams ni rang rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags kyis bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:317a-3: 'dir me'i lhas blangs pa thams cad tshim par 'gyur te /
T02D2625:317a-4: me ni lha thams cad kyi zhal nas /
T02D2625:317a-5: 'byung po thams cad kyi kha'i sgo'o zhes grags la /
T02D2625:317a-7: spyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i //
T02D2625:317a-8: me ni lha rnams zhal yin pas //
T02D2625:317a-9: sna tshogs las ni grub byed pa'i //
T02D2625:317a-10: spyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad //
T02D2625:317a-11: spyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim //
T02D2625:317a-12: tshim par 'gyur na dngos grub ster //
T02D2625:317a-13: gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin dang ;
T02D2625:317a-14: / thams cad spyin sreg dag gis bskangs //
T02D2625:317a-15: de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis //
T02D2625:317a-16: spyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad //
T02D2625:317a-18: spyin sreg thams cad la yang pus mo gnyis cung
T02D2625:317a-19: zad bgrad pa'i bar las ma 'das par rdzas bsreg
T02D2625:317a-20: cing / dgang gzar dang blugs gzar med na /
T02D2625:317a-21: dgang blugs ni khyor bas byas la /
T02D2625:317a-22: rdza sa lhag ma rnams ni pho tshums kyis dbul zhing /
T02D2625:317a-23: mjug tu me'i las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chus zhi bar bya'o //
T02D2625:317a-24: de nas mjug tu me lha slar lha'i dbyibs thob pa la mchod pa dang /
T02D2625:317a-25: bsreg bya cung zad lhag pa rnams phul te /
T02D2625:317a-26: mnyam med mi g-yo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'am /
T02D2625:317a-28: me lha'i rgyal po bram ze rdo rje che //
T02D2625:317a-29: 'bar ba'i 'phreng 'khrug drang srong tshogs kyis bskor //
T02D2625:317a-30: sna tshogs gzugs mnga' las kun sbyong bar mdzad //
T02D2625:317a-31: thub mchog mthu chen drang srong mchog khyod 'dud //
T02D2625:317a-32: gsus che spyan gsum tshad med bzhi yi zhal //
T02D2625:317a-33: 'od dmar 'bar ba'i me tshogs dbus na bzhugs //
T02D2625:317a-34: ral pa'i thor tshugs che bsgyings bka' thub drag / lus kyi rgyan yang dga' byed srang bu thogs //
T02D2625:317a-35: bum pa bgrang phreng dam pa spyin pa dang //
T02D2625:317a-36: dbyi gu gsum thogs me yi dngos grub spyin //
T02D2625:317a-37: 'jig rten skyong ba'i nang na lha khyod 'phags //
T02D2625:317a-38: khyod ni 'phags dang 'byung po mang tshim byed //
T02D2625:317a-39: phyi rol lus kyi gtsug lag don ldan pa //
T02D2625:317a-40: drang srong mchog khyed der ni mngon sum ste /
T02D2625:317a-41: de'i phyir de dag rnams la 'ang 'bras bu stsol //
T02D2625:317b-0: dngos grub kun spyin khyod 'dir bdag @317b gis bstod //
T02D2625:317b-2: snga ma ltar gshegs su gsol te /
T02D2625:317b-3: ji ltar bskyed pa ni rang gi byang chub sems su bsdu'o //
T02D2625:317b-4: de nas de ma thag tu g-yas su dgod par bya ba rnams ni g-yon du yin la /
T02D2625:317b-5: g-yon du dgong par bya ba rnams ni g-yas su dgod pa'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2625:317b-6: drag po spyad pa'i yon chab dang /
T02D2625:317b-8: bsreg bya rnams rgyud 'di las grags pa sngags snga
T02D2625:317b-9: ma rnams nyid las thams cad pa la che ge
T02D2625:317b-10: mo'i p'a pa gra ha na sha ya phat ces
T02D2625:317b-12: 'dir ni dngos por rlung gi ma la bsreg bya phul la /
T02D2625:317b-13: de'i snying gar phyag na rdo rje khams gsum las
T02D2625:317b-14: rnam par rgyal ba drag po sngon bshad pa las
T02D2625:317b-15: / phyag bzhi pa g-yas g-yon dang po ni h'um
T02D2625:317b-16: gi phyag rgyas rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa
T02D2625:317b-17: / / tha ma gnyis na padma dmar po dang /
T02D2625:317b-18: zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub can /
T02D2625:317b-20: khro bo'i rgyan ma lus pas brgyan pa'i yi ge h'um dang /
T02D2625:317b-21: rdo rje rtse lnga pa las bskyed pa sngon bzhin
T02D2625:317b-22: du de dang 'dra ba spyan drang ba la sogs
T02D2625:317b-23: pa byas la mchod pa dang /
T02D2625:317b-24: spyin sreg drag por spyad pa bya ste /
T02D2625:317b-25: bdag nyid kyang de dang 'dra bar yud tsam gyis bskyed pas so //
T02D2625:317b-26: kha cig na re 'dir mchod yon la sogs pas padma dkar zhal mchod ces gsungs pas /
T02D2625:317b-27: 'dir yang zhi ba'i spyin sreg nyid bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:317b-28: de nas mtho ris thob par shes nas 'chad par
T02D2625:317b-29: byed pa ltar las rnam pa bzhi'i spyin sreg bya
T02D2625:317b-30: ste / rgyud las rab tu gsal bar ma phye'o //
T02D2625:317b-31: phyi rol gyi spyin sreg la mi mos pa'am /
T02D2625:317b-32: mi nus pa dag la nang gi spyin sreg kyang gsungs te /
T02D2625:317b-33: gzhan yang nang gi spyin sreg ni //
T02D2625:317b-34: las dang tshe dag dgag pa ste //
T02D2625:317b-35: de ni yid kyis shes par bya //
T02D2625:317b-36: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa spangs //
T02D2625:317b-37: mig dang rna ba sna dang lce dang lus rnams ni //
T02D2625:317b-38: yid las skyes pa sems kyi rgyal po la gnas te //
T02D2625:317b-39: kun du [*kun tu?] rtog pas skyes pa 'di dag kyang //
T02D2625:317b-40: byang chub sems dang yul dang mig la sogs pa dang //
T02D2625:317b-41: rlung gi me yang 'phro ba med pa yi //
T02D2625:317b-42: shes rab kyis ni de bkag ste //
T02D2625:317b-43: yid kyis me la spyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2625:317b-44: de ni nang gi spyin sreg ces //
T02D2625:317b-45: nges pas khyod la ba stan pa yin //
T02D2625:318a-1: yang na med par gyur kyang rung //
T02D2625:318a-2: zlos shing bsgom pa'i tshul gyis ni //
T02D2625:318a-3: ming tsam legs par bris nas kyang //
T02D2625:318a-4: mchod rten phreng bar bya ba dang //
T02D2625:318a-5: zhes bya ba ni ro med par gyur kyang /
T02D2625:318a-6: bzlas pa dang mchod rten gyi bya ba sngon bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2625:318a-7: yang na gzugs su bris nas kyang //
T02D2625:318a-8: spyin sreg mngon par dbang bskur na //
T02D2625:318a-12: spyin sreg rnam pa drug ni bya zhing /
T02D2625:318a-13: de yang ming tsam bri ba ma yin gyi /
T02D2625:318a-15: de dag 'bras bu chen por ba stan pa'i phyir /
T02D2625:318a-16: gdon mi za bar bde 'gror skye //
T02D2625:318a-18: cho ga bzhi char gyi yon tan du spyar ro //
T02D2625:318a-19: thal ba yungs kar phye ma sogs //
T02D2625:318a-20: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bzlas pa'i rdzas chur dor ba'i cho ga ston te /
T02D2625:318a-21: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ni /
T02D2625:318a-22: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na chu klung stong phrag phyed
T02D2625:318a-23: dang gsum yod de zhes 'phags pa sdong po bkod
T02D2625:318a-25: de dag ni klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i smon lam gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir /
T02D2625:318a-26: klung gang dag rgyu mtshor mi 'bab cing /
T02D2625:318a-28: char pa'i chu las byung ba rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
T02D2625:318a-29: 'gro ba mang po'i don du gyur pa'i phyir de kho na bsngags so //
T02D2625:318a-31: de ltar na ni sdig can yang //
T02D2625:318a-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2625:318a-33: de'i 'bras bu ba stan te go sla'o //
T02D2625:318a-34: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed la //
T02D2625:318a-36: cung zad kyang dge ba'i las la mos pa ma byas pa'o //
T02D2625:318a-37: med par lta ba gang yin dang //
T02D2625:318a-38: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten rgyang 'phen par khas len pa rnams te /
T02D2625:318a-39: las med thar pa med kyang rung //
T02D2625:318a-40: gzhung ngan rgyang 'phen pa yi gzhung //
T02D2625:318a-42: byang chub lam las rnam log dang //
T02D2625:318a-44: gang gis byang chub sems bskyed nas ;
T02D2625:318a-45: / yang der slar yang btang ba ste //
T02D2625:318a-46: mi gang byang chub sems gtang yang //
T02D2625:318a-47: de dag thar bar mdzad pa ni //
T02D2625:318a-48: las tshul bsam gyis mi khyab phyir //
T02D2625:318a-49: thams cad mkhyen pa kho nas mkhyen //
T02D2625:318a-51: sems bskyed de ni phas pham pas kyang shin tu lci //
T02D2625:318b-0: zhes ji skad @318b gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T02D2625:318b-1: ba stan la zhe sdang gnod byed dang //
T02D2625:318b-3: dam pa'i chos kyi stegs 'jig pa ste /
T02D2625:318b-4: glegs bam chud gson pa dang /
T02D2625:318b-5: chos smra ba la gnod par byed cing 'gal ba dang /
T02D2625:318b-6: chos kyi bar chad byed pa ste /
T02D2625:318b-8: mi gang chos kyi stegs 'jig cing ;
T02D2625:318b-9: / yang dag ma yin lam smra pa //
T02D2625:318b-10: mi de dag ni spu gri'i so //
T02D2625:318b-11: gtams pa'i lam du 'gro ba yin //
T02D2625:318b-13: sdig pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong ba //
T02D2625:318b-15: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T02D2625:318b-16: mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa la yang 'jigs par mi lta ba'i rjes su dpyad pa'o //
T02D2625:318b-17: pha dang ma la snying ring zhing //
T02D2625:318b-19: pha ma la sems byams pas brlan par ma gyur cing /
T02D2625:318b-20: brlang ba'i sems yod pa ste /
T02D2625:318b-21: 'di dag ni phan 'dogs pas zhing dam pa mthong
T02D2625:318b-22: ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi 'bras
T02D2625:318b-24: khye'u bu mo mdza' bo'i gtam las shes par bya'o //
T02D2625:318b-25: gzhan yang 'phags pa bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed
T02D2625:318b-26: kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i
T02D2625:318b-27: mdo las kyang / gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //
T02D2625:318b-28: de dag rtag tu bde zhing yid kyang bde 'gyur la //
T02D2625:318b-29: 'di la lha dang bcas pa dang ni dbang po dang //

T02D2625:318b-43: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //

T02D2625:319a-2: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //

T02D2625:319a-6: gang dag pha ma rgas pa gso bar byed pa ni //

T02D2625:319a-9: lha rnams du mas rtag tu mdun du bdar bar 'gyur //

T02D2625:319a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa ni /

T02D2625:319a-34: ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa bsdu'o //
T02D2625:319a-35: shes rab thabs rnams med na ni //
T02D2625:319a-37: stong pa nyid snying rje'i snying po can gyis bsdus pa /
T02D2625:319a-38: byang chub kyi sems spros pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2625:319a-42: thabs ni dngos po'i mtshan nyid de //
T02D2625:319a-43: shes rab ces bya dngos po med //

T02D2625:319b-0: @319b rnam par sun 'byin pa kun du [*kun tu?] spyod pa dang /
T02D2625:319b-1: sngom pa'i stobs dag kyang 'dir sogs /
T02D2625:319b-2: zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus pa'am /
T02D2625:319b-3: thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyis bsdus pa'o //

T02D2625:319b-5: rdo rje slob dpon gyi thabs mkhas pa'i che ba'i
T02D2625:319b-6: stobs nyid kyis thar pa thob par ston pas na

T02D2625:319b-12: bgo skal la spyod pa'o zhes gsungs pa 'di ji

T02D2625:319b-29: chos nyid ces bya ba yang /

T02D2625:319b-32: rgyu dang rkyen gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin te /
T02D2625:319b-33: dngos po rnams ni 'di ltar nges la /

T02D2625:319b-35: kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyi gar /
T02D2625:319b-36: ji ltar yang dngos po rnams kyi chos nyid la dpyad du med na /
T02D2625:319b-37: byis pa rnams log par dpyod pa tsam sel ba dpyod pa mkhas pa dag byed par zad do //
T02D2625:319b-38: 'on kyang byis pa dag rang gis ri mo bris
T02D2625:319b-39: pas rang skrag pa ltar rang gis byas pa la
T02D2625:319b-40: rang spyod par 'dod pas de ltar grub pa phal
T02D2625:319b-41: che bas / las bdag gis bya ba gtsor gsungs so //
T02D2625:319b-42: rigs par na rkyen nyid mthu can yin gyi /

T02D2625:319b-44: las 'ga' yang med de mun pa la snang ba
T02D2625:320a-0: dang / mar me la chu'i thigs pa @320a * //

T02D2625:320a-4: te / khab len gyi mthu'i chos nyid lcags kyis thob kyi nor bu dang /
T02D2625:320a-5: zangs la sogs pas mi thob pa bzhin no //
T02D2625:320a-6: de'i phyir 'di chos nyid kyis snod du 'gyur ba

T02D2625:320a-8: pa 'di ni chos nyid kho na yin pas gzhan

T02D2625:320a-16: ste / pa'i phyir ro // ci skal ba du

T02D2625:320a-36: bu lta bu de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs

T02D2625:320a-41: grags chen lha rnams gang byed cing //
T02D2625:320a-43: brgya byin ni mngon par shes pa lnga dang bcas pas /

T02D2625:320b-4: shig / rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi snying po rgya cher
T02D2625:320b-7: // / de ltar rtsa ba'i rgyud ba stan nas /
T02D2625:320b-8: nga ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud phyi ma ston te /
T02D2625:320b-9: 'dir 'chad pa po ni phyag na rdo rje yin la /
T02D2625:320b-10: ston pa dang rgyud kyi bdag po ni sngon bzhin no //
T02D2625:320b-11: kha cig na re rgyud phyi ma dang de'i phyi

T02D2625:320b-14: phyag na rdo rje rgyud kyi bdag po la bstod pa'o zhes kyang zer ro //
T02D2625:320b-15: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po rnams ni gsal bar zad do //

T02D2625:320b-44: spyin sreg la sogs pa rnams ni bdag gis dus gcig tu bshad zin la /
T02D2625:321a-0: gzhung rnam par dbye ba yang bdag gis bsdu @321a * //

T02D2625:325a-48: // / da ni de nas klu chen po brgyang kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D2625:325a-49: klu chen po brgyang kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02D2625:325a-50: phu: zhes bya ba'i sga 'di ni klu rnams kyi rang gi rig pa srog ltar gces pa ste /
T02D2625:325b-0: @325b de bcom ldan 'das la ser sna med par phul ba nyid kyis /
T02D2625:325b-1: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de mnyes pa nyid du byas pa'o //
T02D2625:325b-2: aom phu: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2625:325b-3: mtha' yas la sogs pa smos ba dang rim par spyar ro //
T02D2625:325b-4: ltos 'gro chen po sdig par bri //
T02D2625:325b-5: zhes bya ba ni mtha' yas la sogs pa nyid do //
T02D2625:325b-6: de bas na bdun pa mang po tshig can bsdus pa'o //
T02D2625:325b-7: kha cig na re 'dir mtha' yas la sogs pa
T02D2625:325b-8: las gzhan pa klu ma rungs pa gang yang rung
T02D2625:325b-9: ba cig brdzis par bya'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:325b-10: chung ma yis zhes bya ba ni sprul mgo gsum gsum pa rang re dang 'dra ba yis so //
T02D2625:325b-11: gtor ma dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2625:325b-12: klu rnams yid dga' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs pa gzhag pa'o //
T02D2625:325b-13: 'byung po mar dang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:325b-15: strga'i mar la sogs pa dgag pa'o //
T02D2625:325b-16: sprul mgos zhes bya ba ni sprul mgo'i phyag rgyas so //
T02D2625:325b-17: sprul mgo can rnams dgug ces bya ba ni /
T02D2625:325b-18: lhag ma dgu po rnams te /
T02D2625:325b-19: de yang aom ae dhya hi bha ga wan shri
T02D2625:325b-20: bdzra h'um ka ra ma h'a ka ru ni ka
T02D2625:325b-21: dri shya dza:h'um bam ho: zhes bya ba de nyid
T02D2625:325b-23: yam'anta zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2625:325b-24: phu ta dza: h'um bam ho: zhes bya bas so //
T02D2625:325b-25: de nas bu ni zhe spya ba ni slob ma bzang po dang /
T02D2625:325b-27: kha cig na re bu zhes bya ba rang gi bu tha mal pa ni ma yin te /
T02D2625:325b-28: pha la ngan du smra ba srid pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2625:325b-29: de bas na dpal bde mchog las kyang /
T02D2625:325b-30: spun dang bu gcig lhan cig tu //
T02D2625:325b-31: bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung bya //
T02D2625:325b-32: ye shes der ba stan mi bya ste //
T02D2625:325b-33: sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin no //
T02D2625:325b-34: zhes gsungs so zhes zer te /
T02D2625:325b-35: de ni nges pa ma yin te /
T02D2625:325b-36: gsang ba zla ba'i thig le las //
T02D2625:325b-37: gsang sngags rnams dang phyag rgya dang //
T02D2625:325b-38: de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rnams //
T02D2625:325b-39: thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyang //
T02D2625:325b-40: sngags pas gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2625:325b-41: dmyal ba ngan song bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D2625:325b-42: bu dang slob ma la spyin bya //
T02D2625:325b-44: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang /
T02D2625:325b-45: slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni //
T02D2625:325b-46: slob ma ma yin bu min pa'i //
T02D2625:325b-47: mdun du / phyag rgya mi brjod de //
T02D2625:325b-48: de dag gsang bas phyag rgya 'grub //
T02D2625:325b-50: de bas na rang bzhin bzang po 'ba' zhig gtsor bya'i //
T02D2625:326a-3: pho mo la sogs pa ni 'dir mi gzung ngo //
T02D2625:326a-4: de bzhin du rgyal po dang zhes bya ba la
T02D2625:326a-5: sogs pa gzhan du 'dren pa rnams kyang bsal te
T02D2625:326a-8: de nas bslab pa bshad de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2625:326a-9: dug bsal ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs ston te /
T02D2625:326a-10: 'di mi rnams la 'tshe ba'i klu ni /
T02D2625:326a-15: nya dag gi rigs su gnas par gsungs la /
T02D2625:326a-16: de dag las kyang sprul gyi rigs ni mi rnams la rab tu 'tshe ba mang ba yin zhing /
T02D2625:326a-17: de yang rigs brgyang cu yod de /
T02D2625:326a-18: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las /
T02D2625:326a-19: sa yi steng ni sprul ni brgyang cu dag //
T02D2625:326a-20: gzhan la gnod pa byed cing rnam par 'khyam //
T02D2625:326a-22: de la dug med pa'i rigs ni /
T02D2625:326a-24: lhag ma rnams ni dug dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2625:326a-25: de la dug can de dag kyang rigs rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D2625:326a-26: khro bo dang lus 'khyil pa dang /
T02D2625:326a-28: de la gang gi tshe sprul khro bos zin pa de'i tshe ni /
T02D2625:326a-29: rma'i sgo skya la skrang pa dang /
T02D2625:326a-30: 'byil zhing snum la khrag 'dzag pa dang /
T02D2625:326a-31: cung zad skam zhing bad kan rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2625:326a-32: gal te sprul lus 'khyil pas zin na /
T02D2625:326a-34: ser zhing rab tu skrang ste /
T02D2625:326a-35: mkhris pa rgyas par byed do //
T02D2625:326a-36: gal te sprul gdengs ka can gyis zin na /
T02D2625:326a-37: rma'i sgo gang ste rlung 'phel bar byed do //
T02D2625:326a-38: klu'i rigs ma lus pa'i dug dbye ba ni lta ba dang /
T02D2625:326a-41: so'i dug dang bzhi nyid do //
T02D2625:326a-42: de la reg pa ni lus dang /
T02D2625:326a-43: kha chu dang bshang gcis reg pas dug tu gyur te /
T02D2625:326a-44: lta ba ni mig gdug pa ste /
T02D2625:326a-45: mthong ba tsam gyis dug tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2625:326a-46: dbugs ni kha rlangs me lta bur tsha ba'am chu ltar bsil bas reg na dug tu 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2625:326a-47: so'i dug ni mche bas btab pa las gyur pa'o //
T02D2625:326a-48: de yang dang po gsum ni mdze nad dang /
T02D2625:326a-52: lto sbo ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2625:326a-53: so'i dug ni dbyibs lta bur lta ba ste /
T02D2625:326a-54: sngar ba stan pa gsum nyid do //
T02D2625:326a-55: de yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T02D2625:326b-0: 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa las gsungs @326b pa ;
T02D2625:326b-1: zos pa de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te //
T02D2625:326b-2: mche bas zin dang sos bcad gtad pa'o //
T02D2625:326b-3: gang gis mtshe ba gcig gis khrag byung rjes //
T02D2625:326b-4: de ni dug byung bas ni zin par bshad //
T02D2625:326b-5: gang du mche ba gnyis kyis btab nas su //
T02D2625:326b-6: khrag phyung bar ni 'gyur bar zos pa'o //
T02D2625:326b-7: gal te mche ba gsum gyis sha bcad na //
T02D2625:326b-8: de ni bcad bar gyur pa yin zhes ba stan //
T02D2625:326b-9: gang du mche ba bzhi yis btab nas so //
T02D2625:326b-10: sprul gyi lus ni bzlog par 'gyur ba de //
T02D2625:326b-11: gtad nas zos pa yin zhes bshad pa ste //
T02D2625:326b-12: de ni sman rnams kyis kyang bzlog par dka' //
T02D2625:326b-13: me yi rang bzhin gnad du 'phen pa'i dug /
T02D2625:326b-14: mtshon dang 'dra zhing mtshungs pa dag / ji ltar
T02D2625:326b-15: sngags kyis rab tu zhi 'gyur ba //
T02D2625:326b-16: de bzhin sman gyis zhi bar mi nus so //
T02D2625:326b-17: ji ltar me dpung chen po bud shing la //
T02D2625:326b-18: nges par bsregs la char 'bab skad cig gis //
T02D2625:326b-19: zhi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin dug dag ni //
T02D2625:326b-20: me dpung lta bu'ang sngags kyis zhi bar byed //
T02D2625:326b-21: dug gi mthu rtogs shes nas rab bsgrims te //
T02D2625:326b-22: gsang sngags cho ga bzhin brlabs bsgrubs na ni //
T02D2625:326b-23: ba lang khyu na seng ge ji lta bar //
T02D2625:326b-24: dug dang sprul dang dgos med lhan cig rtse //
T02D2625:326b-26: de dag gi dug dbyung ba'i rgyu yang de nyid las gsungs pa ;
T02D2625:326b-27: dug 'phrog khro bo'i dbang gyur skrag pa dang //
T02D2625:326b-28: de bzhin sngags pa'am bkres pa'i zas phyir ram //
T02D2625:326b-29: sha khon yod pa'am gshin rjes ba stan pa'am //
T02D2625:326b-30: lus la brdzis na de dag za par byed //
T02D2625:326b-32: byis pa gang dag yul gyi rang bzhin ma shes
T02D2625:326b-33: pa de dag la dug de dag gis gnod par
T02D2625:326b-34: 'gyur te / 'di skad du dpal sangs rgyas thod pa las gsungs pa /
T02D2625:326b-35: tha mal yul rnams sprul yin te //
T02D2625:326b-36: yul rnams kyi ni nyes pa dug / lha rnams yul rnams ma shes phyir //
T02D2625:326b-37: thams cad dus su zin pa yin //
T02D2625:326b-39: byis pa de lta bu rnams la thugs brtse bas /
T02D2625:326b-40: rgyud kyi rgyal po rnams las dug bsal ba'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs la /
T02D2625:326b-45: mche ba'i dug rnams bsal ba'i phyir /
T02D2625:326b-48: phyag rgya'i bya ba bla na med pa gsungs so /
T02D2625:327a-0: @327a * // de la re zhig rnal 'byor pas yid dmigs pa la gnas pa thob par byas la //
T02D2625:327a-1: klu'i dkyil 'khor ji skad du gsungs pa las /
T02D2625:327a-2: cung zad du rdo rje 'chang dbu la sprul mgo
T02D2625:327a-3: ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'od zer dkar po
T02D2625:327a-4: kha ba ltar bsil bas bskor ba bskyed la mchod
T02D2625:327a-6: phud ces ba ba 'bum phrag gcig bzlas te /
T02D2625:327a-8: de nas bong la sogs pa'i dbyig dug blangs te /
T02D2625:327a-9: srang tshad la legs par bcal la /
T02D2625:327a-10: dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bsams la /
T02D2625:327a-11: bdag gi lag pa g-yas ba'i mthil du yang /
T02D2625:327a-12: phud ces bya ba'i yi ge kha dog dkar po las ;
T02D2625:327a-13: padma dkar po 'dab ma brgyang pa'i 'dab ma la /
T02D2625:327a-14: lha rnams gnas par bskyed la /
T02D2625:327a-15: dkyil 'khor gnyis las 'od zer dkar po byung bas dug de dag la phog pas /
T02D2625:327a-16: bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid du bsam zhing /
T02D2625:327a-17: dug de'i steng du yi ge phu: dkar po gnas pa las /
T02D2625:327a-18: 'od zer dkar po byung bas kyang de ltar bsam mo //
T02D2625:327a-19: yang na dug gi 'og tu yi ge phu: nag
T02D2625:327a-20: po las byung ba'i rlung gi tshogs drag pos gtor
T02D2625:327a-21: bar bya'o // yang na lag pa sprul mgo'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D2625:327a-22: phu: zhes brjod pa dang phyag rgya'i stobs kyis dug drangs te /
T02D2625:327a-23: sa dang chu dang me dang ka pa la sogs par spo ste /
T02D2625:327a-24: rnal 'byor 'di gsum gang yang rung bas dug bsal bar gyur pa ni /
T02D2625:327a-25: dug de srang la bcal ba nyung bar gyur pa na'o //
T02D2625:327a-26: de nas de mda' dug gam sprul gyi dug rnams
T02D2625:327a-27: rnal 'byor gang la goms pa de nyid kyis bsal
T02D2625:327a-28: te / 'di ni nang gi rnal 'byor kho nas dug bsal ba yin la /
T02D2625:327a-29: phyi rol gyi bya bas dug bsal ba ma gsungs so //
T02D2625:327a-31: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo rtse sprad pas zhags mig ltar byas te /
T02D2625:327a-33: cung zad dgu por byas la /
T02D2625:327a-34: sprul mgo'i gdengs ka ltar bya'o //
T02D2625:327a-35: pags pa sha dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2625:327a-36: rab tu zhe na pa'i dug la sogs pa rnams sel bar ston to //
T02D2625:327a-37: phud ces bya ba'i lag pas drang zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gsum gyi nye bar mtshon pa'o //
T02D2625:327a-38: khu tshur gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:327a-39: phyag rgya dang bral ba'i lag pas kyang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2625:327b-2: // / de ni de nas lha chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
T02D2625:327b-3: lha chen po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ston te /
T02D2625:327b-4: 'di ni lha chen po rnams kyi bdag po yang yin la /
T02D2625:327b-5: 'jigs par byed pa chen po yang yin la /
T02D2625:327b-6: de ni lha'i lha chen po zhes zer te /
T02D2625:327b-7: rang gi gzugs dang lag ca dang /
T02D2625:327b-8: ro phyed tshig pa za bas dur khrod du lhag ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'am /
T02D2625:327b-9: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje khams gsum gyi bdag po rnams btul ba na /
T02D2625:327b-11: bcom ldan 'das la kva'i gnod spyin khyod kyang nga'i bka' nyon cig smras pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2625:327b-12: yang na 'di snying rje nyid kyis 'jigs su rung bar sprul te /
T02D2625:327b-14: bud med chen po brgyang kyis bskor //
T02D2625:327b-16: 'di ni rtag tu dus mtshan dang /
T02D2625:327b-23: lus ngan ma la sogs pa'i ma mo rang gi
T02D2625:327b-24: chung ma drag mo dang bcas pa'i ma mo rnams
T02D2625:327b-25: kyis bskor ba'o // bcom ldan 'das la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2625:327b-26: 'jigs par byed pa'i sgra phyung nas //
T02D2625:327b-28: ha ha zhes drag tu smras nas so //
T02D2625:327b-29: 'di dag gi gsang sngags rnams ni sngar lha rnams ba stan pa dang spyar ro ;
T02D2625:327b-30: / bum pa'am mgo bo'i thod pa ni //
T02D2625:327b-31: de ltar brgyang kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D2625:327b-32: zhes bya ba ni rang rang gi sngags kyi mthar
T02D2625:327b-33: aa bhi shinytsa mam zhes brjod de dbang bskur la
T02D2625:327b-34: / yang phyag rgya'i dbang bskur ro //
T02D2625:327b-35: de nas las rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni dngos grub ston te /
T02D2625:327b-38: sa rnams spyin pa ma gtogs par //
T02D2625:327b-40: 'di dag rab tu mthu dang ldan par ston pa ste /
T02D2625:327b-41: sa spyin pa ni rang gi sems rab tu spyang
T02D2625:327b-42: ba 'ba' zhig la rag las pas de ni mi
T02D2625:327b-43: nus te gzhan spyin ba ste /
T02D2625:327b-45: 'phags pa da kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02D2625:327b-46: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la /
T02D2625:327b-48: grogs rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang
T02D2625:327b-49: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub spyin par sgrubs shig
T02D2625:327b-50: / de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol
T02D2625:328a-0: to // bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub rtsol bar mi @328a * //
T02D2625:328a-2: ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na /
T02D2625:328a-3: bdag cag nyid yang dag par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do zhes gsungs pa bzhin no //
T02D2625:328a-4: bde chen zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po la'ang drag po ste des so //
T02D2625:328a-5: h'um gi tshul gyis rtsol zhes bya bas nga rgyal byas la /
T02D2625:328a-7: h'um zhes brjod cing dngos grub ster ba'o //
T02D2625:328a-9: skrag na de ma thag tu gsod //
T02D2625:328a-10: ces bya ba ni 'jigs par mi bya ste /
T02D2625:328a-11: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang /
T02D2625:328a-12: 'jigs pas lhag pa'i bgegs gzhan med //
T02D2625:328a-14: rdo rje 'jigs par byed pa las kyang /
T02D2625:328a-15: de la 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T02D2625:328a-16: sngags pas de la 'jigs par mi bya'o //
T02D2625:328a-17: ji ltar 'jigs pa de ltar bgegs kyi bar chad du 'gyur ro //
T02D2625:328a-18: bar chad du gyur na dngos grub med de /
T02D2625:328a-19: de'i phyir sngags pas 'jigs par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T02D2625:328a-21: h'um h'um zhes 'brug ltar sgrogs shing /
T02D2625:328a-22: rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor dran pas zhi bar 'gyur
T02D2625:328a-23: ro zhes kyang dpal rdo rje 'chang gis gsung ste
T02D2625:328a-24: / de bas na h'um gi tshul gyis gsol zhes sngar gsungs so //
T02D2625:328a-25: ci'i phyir rab tu zhi ba'i lha rnams sgrub pa po la skrag par byed /
T02D2625:328a-26: thog ma nas rab tu zhi ba'i lus kyis dngos grub mi spyin zhe na /
T02D2625:328a-27: lha rnams ni rab tu zhi bar gnas te /
T02D2625:328a-28: sgrub pa po'i bsam pa'i dbang gis las kyi bag
T02D2625:328a-29: chags dang mthun par drag po la sogs par mthong
T02D2625:328a-30: ste / sngon chad ser sna ba stan pa'i phyir //
T02D2625:328a-31: bgegs ni rang gi sems las byung //
T02D2625:328a-32: zhes tshigs su bcad pa gsungs pas so //
T02D2625:328a-35: // / da ni de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2625:328a-36: pa 'jigs byed de dag nyid zhi bar snang ba'i
T02D2625:328a-38: rang gi dkyil 'khor chung ma rnams //
T02D2625:328a-39: zhes bya ba ni sngar ba stan pa nyid zhi bar snang bar mgul nas 'khyud pa ste /
T02D2625:328a-40: 'dir de dag gi don ni sngar smras zin to //
T02D2625:328a-41: mtho ris kyi lam zhes bya ba ni dge ba bcu'o //
T02D2625:328a-42: bder 'gro lam zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi'o //
T02D2625:328a-43: ngan song ma lags pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba'o //
T02D2625:328a-44: sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:328b-1: / dben pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'o //
T02D2625:328b-2: rnam par dben pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:328b-3: sbyor ba'i lam dang po drod ces bya'o //
T02D2625:328b-4: 'byung pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni rtse mo'i bdag nyid do //
T02D2625:328b-5: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni bzod par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2625:328b-6: dam pa'i chos kyi lam zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mchog go //
T02D2625:328b-7: bde 'gro'i lam zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam dang /
T02D2625:328b-8: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'o //
T02D2625:328b-9: spang ba'i lam zhes pa ni /
T02D2625:328b-11: nyon mongs pa med pa'i lam zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:328b-12: bar chad med pa'i lam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T02D2625:328b-13: ba stan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:328b-14: dngos dang brgyud pas zhes so //
T02D2625:328b-15: tshig de dag kyang rang rang gi lam dang ji ltar 'tsham par dgrol te /
T02D2625:328b-16: bdag gis ni gzhung mangs pas 'jigs pas ma bkrol lo //
T02D2625:328b-17: sangs rgyas nyid kyi 'grub pa'i lam ba stan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:328b-18: mdor na lam dpag tu med pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas la spyar ro zhes bya'o //
T02D2625:328b-19: byang chub sems dpa' nyid ni 'dir bden pa mthong ba yin la /
T02D2625:328b-20: de'i lam nyid de 'grub par byed de /
T02D2625:328b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams so //
T02D2625:328b-22: ba stan par bgyi'o zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2625:328b-23: rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'grub pa'i las ni dbang
T02D2625:328b-24: bskur ba dang bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i lam ste

T02D2625:334b-45: [*'dzom?] po la chu'i chu bur chags pa ltar dang
T02D2625:334b-46: zhing 'bur du dod par bsgom mo //

T02D2625:335b-3: rtse gsum zhes bya ba ni /

T02D2625:335b-9: g-yon pa 'khor lor bya ba ni zla ba'i'o //

T02D2625:335b-13: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni phur bu'i'o //

T02D2625:335b-32: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni bdag por
