T02D2625:337b-7: 'dir rdo rje sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings mi
T02D2625:337b-8: byed pa la dbyer med par sems dpa' chos kyi
T02D2625:337b-9: sku yin la / de las ma nyams pa nyid du khro bor snang bar bskyed pa ste /
T02D2625:337b-11: nyi ma'i zer gyis gdungs pa'i mtsho chen ltar //
T02D2625:337b-12: mnyam pas snying rje chen pos khre byed cing //
T02D2625:337b-13: nang na kha ba ltar bsil phyi rol du //
T02D2625:337b-14: rtsub pa nyid kyis 'gro ba skyong bar byed //
T02D2625:337b-16: rdo rje nyi ma zhes bya ba la /
T02D2625:337b-17: 'dis sdig pa dang 'jigs pa rnams bsreg pa na /
T02D2625:337b-18: me'i khyad par yang bskal pa tha ma'i nyi ma bdun 'bar ba dang 'dra bas na rdo rje'o //
T02D2625:337b-19: de lta bur rab tu mi zad par gnas pa
T02D2625:337b-20: yang chos kyi dbyings las dbyer med pa'i phyir rdo
T02D2625:337b-21: rje zhes pas ba stan to //
T02D2625:337b-24: zhes bya ba ni khang pa brtsegs pa gang las
T02D2625:337b-25: 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa yod pa de
T02D2625:337b-26: nyid lha'i rdzas te yid du 'ong ba'i phyir ro
T02D2625:337b-27: // yang na 'di ni rab tu drag po'i dkyil 'khor yin pa'i phyir me to gdang dri dang /
T02D2625:337b-28: bdug pa la logs pa'i lha rdzas de dag kyang 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba drag po 'khrigs pa'o //
T02D2625:337b-29: shin tu 'bar zhing zhes bya ba la ni /
T02D2625:337b-30: lha rnams 'od zer drag po sku las shin tu 'bar zhing gdug pa rnams bsreg pa'o //
T02D2625:337b-31: cher 'bar ba zhes bya ba ni khang pa brtsegs
T02D2625:337b-32: ma de yang rab tu ma rungs pa'i 'od rgya
T02D2625:337b-33: cher 'bar ba gdug pa rnams bsreg pa'o //
T02D2625:337b-34: ma rungs snying gar mnan nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:337b-35: rang rang gi phyogs skyong ngam sngar ba stan pa bzhin no //
T02D2625:337b-36: de nas bdud rtsi gang yin zhes bya ba kha cig na re mar dang /
T02D2625:337b-37: 'o ma dang bu ram dang kar dang sbrang rtsi ni bdud rtsi lnga'o zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:337b-38: kha cig na re bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis
T02D2625:337b-39: brlabs pa'i 'bru lnga la sogs pa bum pa'i nang
T02D2625:337b-40: du bzhag pa rnams ni bdud rtsi'o zhes zer ro
T02D2625:337b-41: // kha cig na re shu kra la sogs pa
T02D2625:337b-42: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud gzhan las gsungs pa rnams nyid
T02D2625:337b-44: 'dir rab tu ma zhi ba'i chang ni bdud rtsi zhes dgongs la /
T02D2625:337b-46: bza' dang bca' dang bdud rtsi zhes //
T02D2625:337b-47: mgo thod gang bar gyur pa rnams //
T02D2625:337b-48: zhes gsungs pa yang chang nyid yin te /
T02D2625:338a-2: sha'am yang na chang mchog gis //
T02D2625:338a-3: thod pa bkang ste dbul bar bya //
T02D2625:338a-5: 'o ma la sogs pa'i bdud rtsi lnga ni gtsang sbra 'dod pa dag gi dus su yin la /
T02D2625:338a-6: 'dir gtsang sbra'i dgos pa bya ba med pa'i phyir te /
T02D2625:338a-7: rdo rje khro bo la ni gtsang sbra gtsor ma
T02D2625:338a-8: gyur par 'phags pa bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i rtog pa
T02D2625:338a-9: la sogs pa bya ba'i rgyud du yang gsungs la
T02D2625:338a-10: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni //
T02D2625:338a-11: gtsang sbra'i bya ba la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dpal
T02D2625:338a-12: sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i rgyud
T02D2625:338a-14: bdud rtsi 'khyil pas byin gyis brlabs pa'o zhes bya
T02D2625:338a-15: ba la sogs pa smras pa de yang mi rigs
T02D2625:338a-16: te / las kyi bum pa ma yin pa rnams
T02D2625:338a-17: bdud rtsi 'khyil bas byin gyis brlab par bya ba
T02D2625:338a-18: ni nam yang ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T02D2625:338a-19: 'dir bum pa bcu drug ces dbang bskur ba'i bum pa nyi tshe zhig smos kyi /
T02D2625:338a-20: bkang ba'i bum pa ni gtsor ma smos pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2625:338a-21: gzhan yang bkang pa'i bum pa'i dbang du byas pa ni ma yin te /
T02D2625:338a-22: bkang ba'i bum pa ni thos pa kho nar bya bar rigs shing gzhan du ma yin pas so //
T02D2625:338a-23: gang yang shu kra la sogs pa zhes smras pa de yang rab tu rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D2625:338a-24: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi tshul ma lus pa brjod pa /
T02D2625:338a-25: 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las kyang /
T02D2625:338a-27: zla gsang thig le la sogs pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2625:338a-28: shu kra la sogs pa smos pa yang /
T02D2625:338a-29: sgra ji bzhin pa ni ma yin te /
T02D2625:338a-30: bdud kyis smras pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir rab tu mi 'thad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2625:338a-31: 'o na tshe dpag tu med pa'i dkyil 'khor las /
T02D2625:338a-32: sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes bya dang //
T02D2625:338a-33: dam tshig rnams ni bsrung ba dang //
T02D2625:338a-34: sngags mkhan gyis ni bsgrub pa'i phyir //
T02D2625:338a-35: gzhan gyi bud med ba sten par bya //
T02D2625:338a-37: 'dir yang bdud rtsi chen po la sogs pa ba sten par gsungs pas /
T02D2625:338a-38: 'di yang rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhung nyid yin no zhe na /
T02D2625:338a-39: rnal 'byor chen po'i gzhung zhes pa ci la bya /
T02D2625:338a-40: gal te shu kra la sogs pa dngos su ba sten pa dang /
T02D2625:338a-41: bud med la sogs pa dngos su ba sten pas rnal 'byor chen por 'dod na ni /
T02D2625:338a-43: gzhon nu ma 'khrig pas gdungs shing /
T02D2625:338a-44: byang chub sems dpa'i yul la rab tu chags la /
T02D2625:338b-0: de yang bdag pos ma @338b bsrungs shing /
T02D2625:338b-1: byang chub sems dpa' yang khyim pa zhig yin na /
T02D2625:338b-2: des bdag ni sems can dmyal par song yang sla'o //
T02D2625:338b-3: gzhon nu ma 'di'i gdung ba zhi bar byas la /
T02D2625:338b-4: der yang bdag la dga' bar byas te /
T02D2625:338b-5: dga' ba la sbyor ro zhes bsams te 'khrig pa spyad na /
T02D2625:338b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa dang /
T02D2625:338b-7: theg pa chen po 'dir ni gtsor gyur pa snying rje yin pas de srung pa dang /
T02D2625:338b-8: rgyu de gnyis nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2625:338b-9: sngags pa'i dngos grub kyi yan lag tu 'gyur ba
T02D2625:338b-10: zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pas kyang 'grub la
T02D2625:338b-11: / rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T02D2625:338b-12: 'phags pa gsang chen thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo la sogs pa las kyang gsungs so //
T02D2625:338b-14: dam tshig phyag rgya rab gsang ba //
T02D2625:338b-15: 'di ni bud med sgrar ba sten la //
T02D2625:338b-16: mchog phyir bdag gcig ma yin phyir //
T02D2625:338b-17: gzhan zhes bya ba yi ges brjod //
T02D2625:338b-19: dam tshig ni phyag rgya bcing ba nyid gzhan gyi bud med yin gyi /
T02D2625:338b-20: gal te bud med tha mal pa'i yul ba sten pas /
T02D2625:338b-21: thar pa thob par smra ba ni nges par bdud kyis smras par zad do //
T02D2625:338b-23: rnam dag chos nyid khu ba ste //
T02D2625:338b-24: yul rnams bshang ba'i sgrar gsungs la //
T02D2625:338b-25: dbang po rnams ni gci ba ste //
T02D2625:338b-26: rnam shes rten phyir khrag tu 'dod //
T02D2625:338b-27: de las byung ba'i sems byung sogs //
T02D2625:338b-28: tshogs chen phyir ni sha yin te //
T02D2625:338b-29: 'di dag zos pa stod byas pa'o //
T02D2625:338b-30: zhes bshad pas tha mal pa'i shu kra la sogs pa ci'i phyir yon tan du byed /
T02D2625:338b-31: gal te byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer na /
T02D2625:338b-33: rdo dang chu la sogs pa la ci'i phyir byin gyis mi rlob /
T02D2625:338b-34: da ni de dag la rang bzhin gyis mthu yod do zhe na /
T02D2625:338b-35: gal te rang bzhin gyis mthu yod na /
T02D2625:338b-36: byin gyis brlab pa'i bya bas ci zhig bya /
T02D2625:338b-37: gzhan yang khyi la sogs pa dag kyang de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis /
T02D2625:338b-38: ci'i phyir go 'phang bzang po mi 'thob /
T02D2625:338b-39: de'i phyir rab tu btsog pa'i 'dam du bying nas /
T02D2625:338b-40: bdag ni 'dir gtsang sbra byed pa'i phyir zhugs so
T02D2625:338b-41: zhes zer pa'i byis pa ltar smras pa 'di ci
T02D2625:338b-42: zhig bya / de'i phyir gang du yang zab pas mi zab pa gzhom gyi /
T02D2625:338b-43: dman pas gya nom pa mi gzhom pas na /
T02D2625:338b-44: sgra ji bzhin du 'dod pas dgongs pa de gsungs pa ji ltar smad /
T02D2625:338b-45: de bas na lta ba ngan pa ni /
T02D2625:339a-0: sgra ji lta bar don 'dzin pa'o zhes @339a * //
T02D2625:339a-2: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las gzhan pa'i rnal 'byor chen
T02D2625:339a-3: po'i rgyud ces bya ba ni 'ga' yang med do
T02D2625:339a-4: // de ltar na sha dang chang dag kyang 'dir dgag par rigs so zhe na /
T02D2625:339a-5: gang myos par ma gyur pa dang /
T02D2625:339a-6: rnam pa gsum dag pa'i sha ni /
T02D2625:339a-7: de ltar su yang smod par mi byed la /
T02D2625:339a-8: de su la phan 'dogs pa 'jig rten dang mthun
T02D2625:339a-9: zhing rang bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba dang
T02D2625:339a-10: bcas pa yang ma yin no //
T02D2625:339a-11: de bas na gcig kho na bdag dang gzhan de dag ltar gnod pa mi byed do //
T02D2625:339a-12: phyag rgya de dag de yis ni //
T02D2625:339a-13: sha rnams kun gyi dam tshig stsol //
T02D2625:339a-15: phyag rgya de dang de yis ni //
T02D2625:339a-16: zhes zlos bur smos pa ni /
T02D2625:339a-17: yon chab nas bshos kyi bar du rdzas de dang de thod pa'i phyag rgyas dbul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2625:339a-18: kha cig na re de dang de yis ni zhes zlos bur smos pa ni /
T02D2625:339a-19: gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i phyag rgya ba stan pa de dang de yis zer ro //
T02D2625:339a-20: sha rnams kun gyi zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339a-21: ma he dang phag dang ra la sogs pa gang
T02D2625:339a-22: 'jig rten rab tu bsngags pas sdig med pa de
T02D2625:339a-23: dag gis so // dam tshig las stsol zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339a-24: lha bshos kyi dam tshig tu dbul zhing gsol ba'o //
T02D2625:339a-25: lha bshos bzang po rtag tu dbul ba de ni dam tshig gi mchog ste /
T02D2625:339a-26: gang zag bdag gis zas rnams la //
T02D2625:339a-27: thog mar de yi phud phul te //
T02D2625:339a-28: cho ga shes pas bzlas brjod bya //
T02D2625:339a-29: mchod pa'i bshos rnams smos pa las //
T02D2625:339a-30: zas kyi rnam pa ci 'byor pa //
T02D2625:339a-31: mkhas pa dag gis phul nas ni //
T02D2625:339a-32: nyin re rtag tu bzlas brjod tsam //
T02D2625:339a-33: lha bshos phul ba gsang sngags kyi //
T02D2625:339a-34: kha zas yin par bshad pa na //
T02D2625:339a-35: de ni rtag par khams bzhin du //
T02D2625:339a-36: bzlas brjod byed pa dbul par bya //
T02D2625:339a-37: rtsa ba rdo gu 'bras bu yi //
T02D2625:339a-38: lha bshos cung zad ci 'byor pa //
T02D2625:339a-39: dus gsum du ni gsang sngags la //
T02D2625:339a-40: phul nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
T02D2625:339a-41: gal te zlos pas gsang sngags la //
T02D2625:339a-42: mchod pa bshos rnams ma phul na //
T02D2625:339a-43: de tshe rtsub cing mdog ngan la //
T02D2625:339a-44: bkres pa dag gis gdungs par 'gyur //
T02D2625:339a-45: lha rnams grub par mi 'gyur zhing //
T02D2625:339a-46: bgegs rnams kyis kyang zil gyis gnon //
T02D2625:339a-47: lha bshos med na de yi sems //
T02D2625:339a-48: rtog pa dag kyang mang du 'gyur //
T02D2625:339a-49: de bas nan tan cher bya ste //
T02D2625:339a-50: dus mtshams nyin par ci 'byor pas //
T02D2625:339a-51: gsang sngags 'khor dang bcas pa la //
T02D2625:339a-52: lha bshos legs par dbul bar bya //
T02D2625:339b-2: byug spos me tog bdug spos dang //
T02D2625:339b-3: lha bshos spyin sreg yo byad rnams //
T02D2625:339b-4: phongs par gyur kyang mi dbri ste //
T02D2625:339b-7: de nas 'dod ldan rnyed nas ni //
T02D2625:339b-9: 'dod ldan ni slob dpon nyid yin te /
T02D2625:339b-11: rnyed nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339b-12: rdzas dang gnas la sogs pa 'tshogs shing rnyed nas so //
T02D2625:339b-13: yang na 'dod ldan zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339b-14: slob mas te dbang bskur bar 'dod pas so //
T02D2625:339b-15: rnyed nas ni zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339b-16: des yo byad rnyed na slob dpon gyis bsnyen par bya'o //
T02D2625:339b-17: ma rnyed par ni ma yin no //
T02D2625:339b-18: de'i phyir dang po dri ba smos ba'o //
T02D2625:339b-19: h'um zhes bya ba las zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339b-20: sa bon yi ge h'um sngon pos so //
T02D2625:339b-21: bsgrub par bya ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339b-24: de nas sngags mkhan sgor yang zhes bya ba ni shar sgo'am lho sgor ro //
T02D2625:339b-25: h'um zhes bya ba las bsgrub par bya zhes byab pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2625:339b-26: de nyid dran zhes bya ba gsungs te /
T02D2625:339b-27: bdag dang lha dang sngags kyi de kho na dran par byed cing /
T02D2625:339b-28: dkyil 'khor de'i spyan snga kho nar slob dpon bdag nyid kyis bsnyen par bya ba'o //
T02D2625:339b-29: bsnyen par bya ba'i 'bras bu ni nges par zhes bya ba la sogs te go sla'o //
T02D2625:339b-30: dkyil 'khor du ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D2625:339b-31: slob ma smin par bya ba ston te /
T02D2625:339b-32: rgyud las byung ba'i dam tshig ni /
T02D2625:339b-33: spyi'i lha tshogs dang dkyil 'khor la slob ma gzhug
T02D2625:339b-34: pa gnyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba ltar brjod
T02D2625:339b-37: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog bzhag la /
T02D2625:339b-38: slob ma'i tshogs kyis lhag pa'i spyan dang 'dra ba ste /
T02D2625:339b-39: rdo rje sems dpa'i sku'i tshul la gnas nas /
T02D2625:339b-40: phyir 'byung bar byas nas gtor ma spyin no //
T02D2625:339b-41: aom badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa las /
T02D2625:339b-45: gsum pas ni me tog dor ro //
T02D2625:339b-46: bzhi pas ni gdong g-yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor ba stan to //
T02D2625:339b-47: lnga bas ni mna' chu blud do //
T02D2625:339b-48: drug pas ni rdo rje sems dpa'i gsang ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2625:339b-49: bdun pas ni bdag po'i bum pas dbang bskur ro //
T02D2625:339b-50: kha cig na re bdun pas ni /
T02D2625:339b-51: bdag po'i phyag rgyas mjug tu dbang bskur ro zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:339b-52: de bzhin du dbang bskur ro zhes bya ba ni /
T02D2625:339b-53: bum pa bcu drug gis te /
T02D2625:340a-1: dbang bcu gsum mo zhes zer ba ni mi rigs so //
T02D2625:340a-2: de nas de dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2625:340a-3: pa ni spro ba dang bsdu ba gtsor ba stan
T02D2625:340a-4: pa ste / 'di ni rnal 'byor gyi rgyud yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2625:340a-5: rnal 'byor byas la gzhan du bzlas pa nyi chos 'grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2625:340a-6: de nas h'um gis tshogs bzhag la //
T02D2625:340a-7: rdo rje lta bur lus bsam zhing //
T02D2625:340a-9: sgrub pa po'i ba spu'i bu ga ma lus pa
T02D2625:340a-10: dang dbang po rnams la yi ge h'um dkar po
T02D2625:340a-12: de'i 'od zer gyi tshogs des de'i lus rdo rje lta bur mi shigs par bsam zhing /
T02D2625:340a-13: yang de'i snying gar yi ge ham dkar po las
T02D2625:340a-14: 'od zer byung ba'i 'od zer des de'i lus skyes
T02D2625:340a-15: bu ya lad gyon pa ltar g-yogs pas bsrungs pa'i
T02D2625:340a-16: / srung ba'i 'khor los bsrungs pa ltar //
T02D2625:340a-17: cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i go chas go char bya'o //
T02D2625:340a-22: gdags pas go cha bya'o zhes zer te /
T02D2625:340a-23: 'dir dkyil 'khor bya ba bdag gis ni ma rig go //
T02D2625:340a-25: sbyor ba snga ma nyid rang gi 'khor los go char byas so zhes zer ro //
T02D2625:340a-29: // / da ni dkyil 'khor brgyang kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
T02D2625:340a-30: mchod pa dang bstod pas rgyud bshad pa la /
T02D2625:340a-31: lan du mchod par bsams pa dang /
T02D2625:340a-32: gdul bya 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams la yang bslab pa'i phyir /
T02D2625:340a-33: de nas brgya byin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te go sla'o //
T02D2625:340a-34: sangs rgyas kun pas sngar sangs rgyas //
T02D2625:340a-36: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'di ni /
T02D2625:340a-37: byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid yin la /
T02D2625:340a-38: sangs rgyas thams cad ni de las 'byung ba yin
T02D2625:340a-39: pas 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
T02D2625:340a-40: yab yin te / de ltar yang 'phags pa de kho na nyid 'dus pa las /
T02D2625:340a-41: rdzogs pa'i byang chub khyod rag lus //
T02D2625:340a-42: kun gzigs yab ni khyod lags te //
T02D2625:340a-44: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis bsgrubs //
T02D2625:340a-46: gang phyir thog ma tha ma med //
T02D2625:340a-47: byang chub sems ni khyod yin te //
T02D2625:340a-48: khyod la brten te rgyal ba dang //
T02D2625:340a-49: dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun //
T02D2625:340a-51: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi rgyu //
T02D2625:340a-53: de ltar ngo bo nyid kyi sku'i dbang du byas te bstod pa byas nas /
T02D2625:340b-0: da ni chos kyi sku'i sgo nas bstod pa @340b mi shes pa ste /
T02D2625:340b-1: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i mi shes pa shes bya'i sgrib pa dang dri ma ste /
T02D2625:340b-2: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa gnyis ka rab tu phra
T02D2625:340b-3: ba yang ma lus pa spangs pas na kun bcom
T02D2625:340b-4: pa'o // rdo rje ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D2625:340b-5: ye shes 'dus byas kyi grong khyer ma lus par
T02D2625:340b-8: bskal pa du mar rab tu goms byas pa'i //
T02D2625:340b-9: rgyu dang rigs tshul dang ni sa la mkhas //
T02D2625:340b-10: gang gi 'dus byas grong khyer rnam 'jig pa'i //
T02D2625:340b-11: ye shes rdo rje ba stan te 'phags bdag stsol //
T02D2625:340b-13: rdo rje zhes gnyis pa smos pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T02D2625:340b-14: chos kyi dbyings rab tu'am mi phyed pa rdo rje
T02D2625:340b-15: lta bu 'dis rab tu brjod do zhes bshad pas
T02D2625:340b-16: so // de nas rdo rje yis rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2625:340b-17: pa de nyid thob pa'i tshogs kyi rgyal po nyid
T02D2625:340b-19: da ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i bstod pa /
T02D2625:340b-22: thugs rdo rje rnam par dbyer med pa'i ngo bor gyur pa'i sku ni de dag 'dzin pa ste ;
T02D2625:340b-23: sku snga ma gnyis kyang 'di'i thugs nyid yin la /
T02D2625:340b-24: sprul pa'i sku yang 'di nyid kyi snang ba skes pa las gzhan ma yin zhing /
T02D2625:340b-26: sku la sogs pa ji snyed pa /
T02D2625:340b-27: sku 'di nyid yin pa'i dbang du byas te bstod pa'o //
T02D2625:340b-28: da ni rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du byas te /
T02D2625:340b-29: rdo rje ltar mi phyed pas na /
T02D2625:340b-30: zab pa'i sku'i ngo bo ste /
T02D2625:340b-31: sku de yang chos kyi dbyings las /
T02D2625:340b-32: gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T02D2625:340b-33: chos kyi dbyings las ma gtogs pa //
T02D2625:340b-34: gang phyir chos yod ma yin te //
T02D2625:340b-37: la lar me bzhin mya ngan 'da' //
T02D2625:340b-38: la lar rdzogs par byang chub ston //
T02D2625:340b-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
T02D2625:340b-40: yang rgya che bas na sku che ba zhes gsungs
T02D2625:340b-41: te / de ltar sku bzhi'i bdag nyid phyag na
T02D2625:340b-42: rdo rje khyod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes gsungs te
T02D2625:340b-43: te / / tshig rkang gnyis po 'di ni tshogs ma lus pa'i mthar spyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2625:340b-44: 'di ni rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i dbang du phal cher byas te /
T02D2625:340b-46: gya nom pa gang du skyes kyang ngo bo nyid kyi sku las mi 'da' bas na /
T02D2625:340b-47: rdo rje'i yan lag ces bya ba la sogs pas bstod do //
T02D2625:340b-48: bcom ldan 'das 'di thugs rje chen pos bskul bas
T02D2625:340b-49: srid pa dang zhi ba thams cad du snang bas
T02D2625:340b-50: ston te / 'di skad du gsungs pa yang /
T02D2625:341a-0: @341a * // rdo rje 'chang gi gsung thos lha rnams dang //
T02D2625:341a-1: tshang sogs lha min gnod spyin grub pa dang //
T02D2625:341a-2: rig 'dzin klu dang gnod spyin dri za dang //
T02D2625:341a-3: gsang ba pa dang mtshung dang 'byung po rnams //
T02D2625:341a-4: dad pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2625:341a-5: gus pas thal mo spyar nas tshig gsol ba //
T02D2625:341a-6: kye ma srog chags rnams la thugs rjer ldan //
T02D2625:341a-7: kye ma khyod kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas //
T02D2625:341a-8: / kha cig gis ni rdo rje 'bar bar mthong //
T02D2625:341a-9: gzhan gyis dbyig to gzhan gyis 'khor lo dang //
T02D2625:341a-10: de bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum 'bar ba can //
T02D2625:341a-11: gzhan gyis ral gyi gzhu dang be con can //
T02D2625:341a-12: 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs dang //
T02D2625:341a-13: gzhan dag kun gyi zhi ba nyid du mthong //
T02D2625:341a-14: du ma'i sku mnga' dmigs med sku mnga' bar //
T02D2625:341a-15: lha dang gnod spyin gyis mthong de la 'dud //
T02D2625:341a-16: lha min lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa //
T02D2625:341a-17: byang chub sems dpa' mchog rab khyod la 'dud //
T02D2625:341a-18: rig sngags gzhu 'gengs khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud //
T02D2625:341a-19: khyod la bdag cag deng ni skyabs su mchi //
T02D2625:341a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'di la bstod pa lta bu'o //
T02D2625:341a-22: de tsam du snang ba ston par spyod pas na /
T02D2625:341a-23: rdo rje can khyod ni lha rnams kyi nang na
T02D2625:341a-24: mchog nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstod
T02D2625:341a-25: pa ste / tshig gi don ni go sla bas rnam par ma phye'o //
T02D2625:341a-26: gang gis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2625:341a-27: bstod pa bris pa la sogs pa'i yon tan bsdus te bstan pa'o //
T02D2625:341a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T02D2625:341a-29: rjes su yi rang ba ba stan to //
T02D2625:341a-30: rab zab rgyud 'di'i snying po ni //
T02D2625:341a-31: bdag gis 'dir brjod kho nar zad //
T02D2625:341a-32: gang du gzhung don rnam ma phye //
T02D2625:341a-33: bla ma mnyes par byas la blang //
T02D2625:341a-35: bzod smra dge ba gang yin des //
T02D2625:341a-37: bdag kyang sangs rgyas 'gyur bar shog /'phags pa ngan
T02D2625:341a-38: song thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba
T02D2625:341a-39: / cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po chen po'i rgya cher 'grel pa /
T02D2625:341a-40: snying po rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba /
T02D2625:341a-41: dza' lndha ra'i rdo rje slob dpon /
T02D2625:341a-42: k'a ma deha nu pa zhes bya ba'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2625:341a-44: // / a'a ts'a rya bi na ya tsandra dang /
T02D2625:341a-45: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis /
